author: {'steamid': '76561198973801216', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2444, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2392, 'last_played': 1707591824}
review:
Me ha gustado mucho el juego, aunque tengo que admitir que no es perfecto. Por un lado, mi ruta favorita ha sido la de Caramia, me parece simplemente una greenflag con patas; la ruta de Kyrie me perturbaba por momentos ya que es un sádico; la ruta de Axel me ha gustado porque él es increíblemente mono, aunque por momentos se me hacía un poco lenta. Los triángulos amorosos me han gustado, aunque a veces sentía que los problemas que surgen para que quieras cambiarte de pareja son un poco forzados, sobre todo los de Caramia. Fuera de la familia Oz, me ha gustado mucho la ruta de Caesar aunque es un poco corta para mi gusto, hubiera preferido más desarrollo; la ruta de Sho me gustó mucho también, probablemente la ruta con mayor misticismo de todo el juego; la ruta de Scarlet la adoré por la trama pero me perturbaba que fuera un niño, como que parece que tiene 13 años, ojalá el personaje fuera más adulto la verdad; la ruta de Pashet no fue lo que esperaba, creía que sería un bonito romance entre dos chicas pero es una ruta llena de una hermosa amistad entre ella y la protagonista, la verdad no me molesta que la ruta sea así pero hubiera sido bonito un romance; la ruta de Robin Hood no me ha gustado, si bien el personaje se ve super bien físicamente es un señor atado a un pasado y lleno de traumas, no es que eso esté mal pero no creo que haya suficiente desarrollo como para justificar el romance con la protagonista; la ruta del brothel es...algo diferente a lo que solemos ver en los otomes, y tengo sentimientos encontrados, si bien el final bueno me gustó el final malo me traumatizó de por vida. Para finalizar con las rutas, la ruta oculta, por así decirlo, me gustó pero apenas comparten tiempo la protagonista y el nuevo interés romántico, lo que la convierte en una de las rutas más apresuradas del juego. 

Por último, no me ha gustado mucho el desenlace común del juego, tras acabar con todas las rutas y alcanzar como mínimo el 98% del juego puedes jugar el final de la historia común donde ningún romance se desarrolló, y si bien lo amé porque vi otro lado de Kyrie que me hizo amar al personaje en cierta medida, creo que el misterio alrededor de la protagonista no es suficiente, vengo a decir yo sabía quién era ella desde el principio y la resolución que le dan me pareció floja y un poco desconectada del resto del juego. La nota que le daría al juego es un 8 de 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561199380887213', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6459, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6459, 'last_played': 1706859456}
review: The game has very little to no character development. A lot of the routes are forced. You will get no answers until the very end when you watch the epilogue and grand finale. Even then you will still have a few questions unanswered. The only routes I enjoyed was Caesar, Scarlet, and Hamlin. The MC is very lacking. She not even concerned or try to find answers about her situation except in one route. That said I do not recommend since those routes aren't good enough to justify the purchase.

author: {'steamid': '76561198257080731', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2071, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2071, 'last_played': 1706626213}
review:
I won't be too verbose about this game, yet it deserves more words to be spoken of.
I played it to pleasurably degrade and to kill my time, so I never had any high expectations. My sceptical mood was pretty soon ruined, because this game really knows how to manipulate your emotions to make you feel happy and not notice any flaws it has. 
So I did feel happy, warm and comfortable. Leaving aside some dark routes, this game is pleasurable and calm. And now, having finished it, I feel unbearably sad. Otome masters sure know all these tricks to make girls become addicted to this type of games, so... I found myself thinking of buying PS Vita to play Diabolik Lovers. Damn these otome-games!

author: {'steamid': '76561198821445674', 'num_games_owned': 57, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 431, 'last_played': 1705166893}
review:
Great visuals, plot and characters (especially their inspirations on tales) but it lacks a bit in terms of interface. It would have been better if there was a way to somewhat know where you are chronologically, which route you're actually pursuing or your current affection level. Also the story is told in many small parts slice-of-life casual and it makes the pacing sometimes rough and hasty.

One thing that stands out though is that when you finish a route and may go back to a save to make different choices to get another ending, there is sometimes a new dialogue popping in between before you even make the choice.

author: {'steamid': '76561198201730590', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 7861, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7861, 'last_played': 1571026328}
review:
Full disclosure that I bought this at first purely for the soundtrack and Satoi's (Diabolik Lovers, Olympia Soiree, and Norn9 artist) gorgeous art style. It is quite the hefty price but I find it worth it considering that there was enough content for me to put in over 100 hours to complete all the routes and get to the grand ending. The MC is not my favorite I've come across in an otome game, but at least you can excuse her personality as you get through the lore. I very much enjoy the world-building, but wish that some aspects of it were covered more in-depth. Some of the routes were too short or non-substantial enough for my liking and there were some routes that really leaned into what one would expect with the whole mafia plot line. There are quite a bit of innuendos and dark comedy moments (as well as general comedy). 

The oz brothers, Scarlet, Pashet, Ceasar, Soh, and Hamelin are generally safe routes with very little graphic things. However, the brothel and Dr Robin Hood have some graphic and/or concerning things that can be jarring compared to the lighthearted (fairy tale-like, one might say) feel of some of the other routes. Although the premise is a town ruled by the fairy tale mafia families so I guess it should not be as surprising that there are some very dark moments as I found it.

My favorite part of this whole game may be the grand ending and the final unraveling of loose threads in the story. It was pleasantly surprising and I enjoy a good twist.

author: {'steamid': '76561199163682820', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1044, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1044, 'last_played': 1699740048}

author: {'steamid': '76561199212054730', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1862, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1862, 'last_played': 1703789843}
review:
So I finally decided to play the game 100%, and I don't regret it.
Spoiler warning !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

The game plot is really interesting because in every route, you only get a little bit of the real plot of the story, and which one you see depends on the ending. Beautiful art work and good music

Now the character:

Caramia: 
The Don of the Oz family and part-time cook. He was kind of not what I expected. He is nice and charming, but it left a lot to be desired. 5/10 because it didn't have the lovey-dovey that I expected.

Kyrie:
He was HELLA MEAN. Offf, honestly, I was mad at him at times, and then he turns around and says something nice. I just wanted to strangle this dude. But his endings were sweet, not gonna lie, 7/10 because I was pissed off most of the time.
The Grand finale made me sad :((( +1 point. 8/10.

Axel: 
Such a cutie! He is so nice and sweet that I got diabetes from him (in a good way). One of the endings made me a bit sad, but it was still really good. 10/10 best boi Axey. You can depend on this man but a bit clingy. 

Pashet:
Don of the Boots family NOT A YURI ROUTE! I liked it; it's more of a best friend or girl boss thing. We still have a little bit of love sprinkled in there, but not too much. 6/10 because it is good, but not that good, and SPOILER! She was going after my best boi. :(

Scarlet:
Stand in Don of the Grimm family. Matrue, but at the same time, he has an inferiority complex about his height. A good stroy, but if you think you get a kiss scene with him, then forget it. Honestly, we did a lot more with the others, if you know what I mean, and we did not get anything from him. 6.7/10 because, come on, at least give us a kiss scene or something like that.

Ceasar:
Don of the Wolf Gang (kind of) Man is drawn hot, but thats about the only thing you get with him. I was so hyped about his route, but it left me a bit disappointed. Going Prey, I'm going to kill you. Prey, I will rip you to pieces. Like come on, I was hoping we could go on a date or something. After a while, that will happen, but it was a bit too short, in my opinion. 7.8/10 because damn, he looks good.
 
Brothel: 
On this route, I was SCREAMING. Like what the actual fuck is happening here. How and why are these the only options that we have in this situation, What the hell? My mouth was open the whole time when I was playing this. 3/10, and I am being generous here just because of Manboy. Hella graphic.

Robin Hood:
He was not bad, but I didn't like him that much. You might be wondering why, ah, yes, because SPOILER! He is still keeping his half-dead wife in a casket-like thing. Bro, wtf, move on. And he still had the audacity to sleep with us. 5/10. I don't like him, but it's not as bad as Dorian Gray.

Soh:
He was fun and sweet, and then you see the grand finale and think, Wow, did you really have to do that? His endings confused me, but when I read the epilogue, I understood what was going on. Because man is a dog (literally). 8/10. I still like him, but he should have just stayed nice the whole time.

Hamlin:
Former Don of the Grimm Family UFFF You will hate him if you see him on another route, but damn, he stole my heart. He was soooo cuteee. I wish his route was longer. He really deserves better; even his endings suck for him and what he had to live through just because he wanted peace. 9.8/10 best boi beside Axel, a good rival. I loved him honestly.

So after getting to 99%, you will be able to see the grand finale, and honestly, it's kind of bittersweet, which made me tear up a bit. 9/10 because she and Scarecrow deserved better. :,( 
I recommend it, but it's not the best game. It's a bit overpriced, but I bought it when it was half off, so maybe you should do that too. Well, everything I mentioned here was MY OPINION so take it with a grain of salt. Good Day!

author: {'steamid': '76561198011848451', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4116, 'last_played': 1694967544}
review:
This is after playing every single playthrough, getting the epilogue and grand finale, and based on my experience with other Otomes and Japanese manga: This Game is a mess that left me pretty disappointed and 'eh' in the end. 

I kept with it because just need something to distract me during a week I have to heal from an injury and always wanted to play the game after seeing that some people loved it. Also I kept waiting for the quality of story to improve, and by the time it hit me they weren't going to I felt too deep. 

What I liked: Pretty. Fun character design. Some unexpected and wild routes. Like the brothel one THAT was over the top and ridiculous, loved it.

What I didn't like: 
-None of the routes are particularly satisfying from a romance or story point of view, especially not the major ones. 

- The melodramatic Maximilism that makes the brothel route so fun isn't on display 90% of the rest of the time which is tragic, since it's a very melodramatic story and idea. I just felt like "....okay." 

- a lot feels like a massive slog

-The routes or chosen romances etc have no bearing on how the end plays out or the big picture. 

-The main chara is not very smart and is constantly reminded of this by many of the relationship targets. She puts up with a lot of abuse with a smile.

- speaking of abuse, there's some noncon played as romance in a way that's especially disturbing on one route that I'm still trying to wrap my head around, and I'm fully conversant in the quirks of Japanese romance tales, especially older ones. Despite that this felt ESPECIALLY very wrong. 

- Super choppy feeling at moments, and that gets worse into the endings who don't feel connected to all that went before

Big resounding MEH with a side of WTF for a lot of points. Not worth the time investment for me, and I have a lot of tolerance for big over the top crazy romance; this actually needed more insanity to be closer to enjoyable, either in the love stories or just in the world and execution.

author: {'steamid': '76561198158379268', 'num_games_owned': 73, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2653, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2653, 'last_played': 1694684826}
review:
After I finally finished the game I played the song loudly and happily: Looking for Freedom by David Hasselhoff.

Unfortunately, it's really one of the worst otomes I've ever played.

It feels like an elementary school play. The story doesn't really make sense anywhere, things are constantly being skipped over and there is no real consistent plot.

Sad because the setting had such a potential...

author: {'steamid': '76561198053249653', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2190, 'last_played': 1691874559}
review:
A lot of conflicting feelings. 

Id say I'm more on the neutral side when it comes to this game, and it would be a lie to say that I hate/ didn't enjoy any of this game. 

But I can't pinpoint any good reason as to why I could recommend this game.  I feel like if the story was more focused on the overall mystery, then it would have been a more meaningful experience. 

If you're just looking for popcorn material or you're like me and cripplingly addicted to otomes then go right ahead, maybe wait for a steam sale. 

But don't go in with any high expectations. Also, look at the trigger warnings for particular infamous routes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198365034346', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 889, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 889, 'last_played': 1691008948}
review:
the first thing that bothered me a lot was the lack of a plot, mc just happens to show up out of nowhere without her memories and that's it. To be fair with the game however the art is really cute and I really liked some of the routes. 
The routes with ceasar nad scarlet made me laugh and smile a lot however I was truly shocked and unconfortable with the brothel  route, in fact there is no warning of the slightest about this route and if I knew about it I wouldn't have brought the game at all. it was dirty, hideous and unconfortable and I felt really angry about it and thanks to it I don't feel like starting any other route since I don't want other unpleasant surprises. I am very disappointed and frustrated about it. I am not sure it was worth the money I spent on it.

author: {'steamid': '76561199426467199', 'num_games_owned': 41, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 888, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1699468713}
review:
"PANCAKKESSS!!!!!1!!!11"
(Yes this game has them. Good we're not a in a vampire mansion. *cough*)

BEAUTIFUL ART! <3 Satoi sensei unproblematic and best artist in otoge imho!
(You might have heard of diabolik Lovers. - Anime "bad/fanservice" games "gud".)

Nice story, felt a little repetetive at times. At least for some main cast.
That said: I still need to finish all routes!
Sad that there's no achievements. (But cards.)
Music is good and didn't get on my nerves after playing for a long time.

There's MANY routes and characters you're in for a long run and many nice characters!
It's cute that it took inspiration from the wizard of Oz.
It's made me smile quite often.
(Green haired characters outta the window. lol)

Recommended! <3
Will update if I finish all the routes. :D

(On that note: Can we PLEASE get DiaLovers on steam? :3)
_
To those who were like this is "problematic" it is a MAFIA themed game! What did you expect? O.o It has death, bad guys and typical otome elements where I'd kick them in the shins in real life. This is a game. It has routes you needn't play. It has MAFIA themes and guns. Hory sheet. :V

While we're on the topic: YES you might even like this if you like BSD. It's just a lot more otome. And less sherlock holmes.

And yes the heroine is... Sadly a stereotypical otome game heroine.
(Even Yui has more bite imho. XD) I still enjoy it. It's an older Otome Game. <3

author: {'steamid': '76561198286589590', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2917, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2917, 'last_played': 1688386425}
review:
Voici mon avis après y avoir joué 48 heures et fini le jeu à 98 % :

Le jeu est plutôt agréable à jouer, cet otome game possède plusieurs qualités que la plupart des jeux de ce style n'ont pas :
- Il y a beaucoup, beaucoup de personnages qui possèdent une route avec plusieurs fins.
- Etrange, mais original, vous pouvez décider de changer de route sur certains personnages ( il y a des versus à certains moments de l'histoire qui nous laisse le choix de changer de personnages alors que étions déjà entrain de sortir avec l'un des personnages, le jeu nous laisse le choix de sortir avec autre. )

Certains artworks sont très jolis, notamment les personnages. Néanmoins, les décors qui ne sont pas souvent utilisé sont affreux... Surtout qu'il y a un effet " fresque " par dessus l'écran. Vous pouvez trouver ça joli, mais quand le décor est déjà hideux, ça n'arrange rien.
Mis à part pour la vraie fin du jeu, il n'y aucun développement de l'histoire, le protagoniste s'en ficherait presque d'être amnésique. D'ailleurs il s'agirait, je pense, du protagoniste le plus débile que je n'ai jamais vu. ( Ce que je trouve personnellement hilarant. )

Certaines fins sont extrêmement difficile à obtenir car rien d'indique ou laisse envisager qu'il faudrait faire tel ou tel choix pour avoir une illustration. Même avec une soluce, il reste compliquer de toutes les obtenir. Par ailleurs, elles sont très jolies mais je trouve qu'elles se ressemblent énormément ce qui est dommage.

BONUS : je ne m'attendais à ce qu'il y est une route brothel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198184459074', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4990, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4990, 'last_played': 1686583814}
review:
Ich kann OZMAFIA für Otome-Fans empfehlen, welche sich für Charakter fokussierte Alltagsgeschichten, literarische Figuren interressieren und etwas für nebenher lesen möchten.

Was ich zu bemängeln habe ist der fehlende rote Faden in den Routen, der aber erst viel zu spät auftaucht. Ich musste bereits wegen einem Crash meine verlorene Spielfortschritt wiederholen und es gibt vereinzelt Bugs, wie z.B fehlende CGs in der Gallerie.

author: {'steamid': '76561198432310146', 'num_games_owned': 478, 'num_reviews': 218, 'playtime_forever': 1607, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1607, 'last_played': 1688215112}
review:
[h1] 黑手党x童话 [/h1]

砂糖太太的画真养眼，好喜欢这种淡淡水彩风。
[hr][/hr]
卡拉米亚
奥兹的boss，阳光大狮子，本子那边常见的王子型人设。
顺带吐槽这作剧本娘是有多喜欢NTR啊…甚至单人路线里劈腿的对象不只一位，光狮子线就有三个人，而且女主移情别恋也太快了点吧！
[spoiler]常年在乙游里养成的在一条线里专一习惯让我很难适应这种过山车般的NTR冲击， [/spoiler]这渣得也太干脆了简直堪称没心没肺[strike] （归根究底制作组偷懒不想写差分） [/strike]，我都心疼因工作繁忙不得不和女主分手的卡拉米亚了…

阿克塞尔
闷骚铁皮人，戴着眼镜却武力值强的反差萌。
啊这，卡拉米亚你不是工作繁忙么？怎么在阿克塞尔线里不忙了反而开始撬好兄弟的墙角呢！？[strike] （这什么表面兄弟） [/strike]救命为啥劈腿线里和卡拉米亚这么甜，害得我彻底忘记这是在阿克塞尔线里了…

奇利耶
毒舌乐子人，稻草人。
这条线女主有点小恶魔，又是熟悉的三兄弟互挖墙角剧情，跟前两条线类似，小打小闹，戏剧性童话却又充满了平凡的线。
TE通关，[spoiler] 只有奇利耶和魔女受伤的世界达成了 [/spoiler]

哈梅尔
发癫起来谁都怕，不发癫的时候就是痞坏温柔大哥哥。
身份不简单，很有故事的样子。
TE通关后，呜呜呜好惨一哥们，从头到尾都被当道具驱使。

斯卡雷特
靠谱正经好正太。
我玩得最开心的一条线（前面推的奥兹三人线我全程地铁老人看手机表情）。
中规中矩的小甜饼，在群魔乱舞[strike] （混乱路线） [/strike]中脱颖而出。

帕谢
帅气猫娘，友情线。
帮闺蜜出谋划策追心上人，
不幸被拒后经历一波挫折及和好，没有糖的亲友路线。

凯撒
白毛傲娇二哈。白毛控第一眼就被他吸引了，可能是因为没有ntr，外家族的这三人的路线我都很喜欢，虽然整个过程趋于平淡，基本培养感情，化险为夷，越过重重阻碍两人相爱，但是至少没有奥兹三人那分割严重的劈腿剧情。
TEGE没有见凯撒的身影，[spoiler] 看来身为多萝西魔力的他为了实现fuka的愿望永远消失了…哎…. [/spoiler]

娼馆
震惊我三观，这啥删减版黄油女主恶堕剧情？居然出现在全年龄乙游里！？
[spoiler]3P，NTR，SM，调教，监禁 [/spoiler]，各种像是18里会出现的标签应有尽有。
不是……我就想跟曼波好好聊聊天，怎么就被老鸨大叔盯上了，[i] 我不要大叔也不要黄毛男娼啊！ [/i]
就不能好好纯爱嘛！！全年龄搞这样一条线太令人不适了，[spoiler] 瞬间让我想起芙兰与罪人之岛的黄毛线了。[/spoiler]
而且queen结局…怕是之后走向会近似era[spoiler] queen [/spoiler]（？）

罗宾
戴着乌鸦面具的文质彬彬的医生
三观震碎….啊？已婚人士也能攻略！？（我表示拒绝）
剧本娘这是牛上瘾了？这作的卖点不会就是牛头人吧！？
[spoiler] 与哈梅尔是仇人（以前是好友，现在是杀妻之仇敌）[/spoiler]。
不管he还是be他奄奄一息的[spoiler] 妻子[/spoiler]都要凉，实惨。

索
亲切温柔实则冷酷的餐厅店长。
[spoiler] 罪魁祸首…令人又爱又恨。[/spoiler]
因为喜欢[spoiler] 上fuka放弃了计划，选择了消失，有点小感动 [/spoiler]
但在TE里，[spoiler] 冷静残酷的告知fuka真相并要求她消失简直堪称残忍，[/spoiler]emm很难评。

TE- GE
本作最精彩的线，也是主线。
前面都是边打瞌睡边点鼠标或auto过去的，看到TE剧情，人像打了鸡血立马精神了（笑）。
具体不剧透，TE可谓是本作点睛之笔，前面路线受的苦总算换得回报。
伏笔铺垫回收，フーカ、索和凯撒的真实身份一并揭露，有刀也有感动，本作我最满意的一条线。
不过这样就陷入了一个大问题（雷区）：
[spoiler] 奇利耶究竟喜欢的是fuka还是多萝西？ [/spoiler]

总的来说，这游戏光TE- GE这条线值回本价了，不过我仍然建议打折入手。
顺带汉化现在替换steam英文遇到op直接会退出无法像以前那样进行游戏，
推荐大家去找日文原版然后在把汉化补丁覆盖上去游玩，
日文原版可在[spoiler] 翼梦 [/spoiler]论坛找到。

续作（前作）听说2024年发售（分三部），一股又期待又不愿再体验牛头人的纠结心情……只能祈祷续作剧本娘能写出能说服我的NTR吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198110238817', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1633, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1632, 'last_played': 1687980382}
review: Game that seems cute and nice at first but is actually really gross. There is an uncountable number of actual cheating routes + a very dirty actual brothel route. And if you want to get the final ending you are forced to go through all routes including that. Additionally, most side character routes are heavily disappointing. The game also wont show you CGs of most events happening and instead cuts to black. There are still some fun adorable routes and I liked some of the characters a lot (Soh, Scarlet, Ceasar <3) but its absolutely not worth the 32 Euroes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054280780', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4309, 'last_played': 1683618500}
review:
Alright, so I just finished Ozmafia and here are my thoughts as a seasoned otome gamer on this title:

-I bought this game & initially gained interest bc I instantly noticed Satoi's distinct style as I am a longtime fan of the Diabolik Lovers series. That being said!! Personally I lean more toward horror/psychological side plots and themes, making parts of this game idea for what I look for in the series.

-The play style is incredibly,,,unique. Let's go with that. I think the concept of the love triangle routes is awesome but maybe not ideal if you are trying to get to the meat of the story. Most of it feels like fluff outside of the pure turmoil some of those side paths in Kyrie's route put you through. Points for creativity but I'm not the biggest fan since it can be confusing, especially to newer otome gamers. Sincerest apologies to those who played this as their first lol. 

-I really love the overall storyline and concept! The side characters are so lovable. 

-My personal favorite routes were Kyrie, Scarlet, Sou, and the Brothel Route. Unpopular opinion on that last one, I know, but the writing is just *chef's kiss*. It's so true to the disturbing feeling that Dorian Grey's source material creates.

-Alfani is my favorite character, yall can be mad about it! Scarlet and Kyrie are runner-ups. I find Axel, on the other hand, to be insufferable but hey that's just me. I never really like the megane types. 

-Main low point in the game for me is the music being realllyyy repetitive and never really striking me if I'm honest. The limited music variety can make scenes feel awkward or not properly set at times. If this bothers you, of course, you can always turn music off. Just a picky point. 

I think I'd give it a 7/10 for ingenuity and creativity. It's worth giving a shot and has a lot of the elements of old school otome gaming I can appreciate. If I could go back and do anything different I think I would have bought this for PS Vita rather than PC just for ease of access and because of how frequently you need to save to get all the CGs and whatnot. If only the vita store were still open, huh? The ending made me cry a little. Most games have that effect after I spend about a year slowly working my way through em. If you're on the fence about this one, consider giving it a chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198393136423', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2975, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2975, 'last_played': 1683264806}

author: {'steamid': '76561198066634242', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 429, 'last_played': 1555453956}
review:
Love the artwork and was excited to play the routes of the characters that I was most interested in. However, the stories weren't very interesting and the endings for characters seemed very lack luster. It might have been different if I played the main three's routes, but the game boasts romance with all these different characters, only for them to be droll and lacking something that most good Otome games have. 

The ending didn't have to be a 'happy ending', but most of them are just kinda-Meh or have me saying 'Is that it?' and looking up a walk through to see if I got the 'bad' endings (Or it the game glitched and took me to the end screen). It was honestly a bit disappointing, because the price wasn't really worth plots that are so similar that it just gets boring.

Overall, I like the pretty pictures-I use one as my Icon on occasion-but that about it for the game. Pretty boys/girls with 
 a story that has little to no personality or the charm that keeps me interested in it.

review: Although I chose not to keep this game I wanted to share just in the bit I did play this was a horrible game play to me. author: {'steamid': '76561198800308864', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 514, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 442, 'last_played': 1682579040}
review:
hmm.. so far i played a total of 4 routes, scarlet, soh, caesar, and caramia. id be lying if i said this game wasn't good as a simpleminded visual novel you can fangirl over( i freaking loved scarlet's route and character) but overall, the game is also problematic

(from this point on theres a lil bit of spoilers)
i mean first off, theres Kyrie, who i ABSOLUTELY despise because of his awful personality. maybe ill force my way through his route someday but he constantly talks about either killing us ( despite being in the same familia)  or ... hinting at doing inappropriate stuff, as well as trying to pursue us even when we are in a relationship in some routes. his character is awful and honestly ruins 60% of the dialogue and game for me.

while i love the cliches and love a mc who is sweet and aloof at times.. THIS ONE IS SO DUMB. the MOST you can get of her standing up for herself is an option that says "Be annoyed" at a remark the familia says towards her.. BUT THATS IT. if you want a character who is sweet, cute, aloof, but can still make her own decisions and show a form of personality.. this one is not it. 

overall, i love the art and designs and the music. i think those three factors truly make the game as great as it is! but if youre looking for characters with personalities and backstories that make you want to learn more, this game just doesnt  make you feel that way. you finish a route, and then move on giving little to no thought.

review:

Unfortunately, there was a whole lot of nothing that happens. I waited patiently for something to happen, but it never delivered. There were some parts that were interesting but it mostly fell flat. It sadly just became a giant wait-fest.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112000134', 'num_games_owned': 93, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1774, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1774, 'last_played': 1676309745}
review:
Worth buying! Great story, beautiful art, talented voice actors and pretty mature story (in some routes or dialogues). Caramia and Kyrie are the best, loved them in every single route.  Brothel route is kinda out of the story compared to the others and it's not for everyone. 
What i did not like about the game is that Hamelin's route was pretty rushed and lacked the romance a bit. He should have been the "locked route" of the game and get more screentime as a good guy and not villain.
If i could rank the routes (main routes), it could be like this: Kyrie - Caramia - Brothel - Hamelin - Caesar - Scarlet - Soh - Robin Hood - Axel - Pashet.
Wish they would bring Diabolik lovers to steam too :(

author: {'steamid': '76561198437509458', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 2336, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 535, 'last_played': 1681357246}
review:
I can't wait to play the crap out of this game. I have only finished 1 route so far but I am looking forward for the 9 others! I really like the story so far + I'm a big fan of Satoi's art!

Update: 9/10 routes completed, only Sou is left! It sucks that you can't romance Pashet because you eventually find out that she likes Axel so that was underwhelming for me :( Robin's route made me feel a bit uncomfy despite him being like the prettiest one of them all because it felt like NTR ngl..And for the brothel route, I did not expect it at all it was so explicit in writing, the CGs were suggestive but it's nothing too NSFW, it's not that obvious. I went through that route in my college campus' study hall lol 

So far the writing is actually really, really good! It felt like the game's originally English because of the eloquence, like you could tell they went beyond just translating it! I enjoyed all the routes I've taken so far although some bits felt shallow...Other than that, it's wholesome but definitely has dark elements to it *ehem* brothel route *ehem*

Update 2.0: Goddamn it...I am absolutely broken and I don't think I can recover from this for a while..
Update 3.0: I decided not to complete the rest (love triangles), I did finish the epilogue though and it made me bitter as fuck so I'm just going to watch a walkthrough of the grand finale :")

author: {'steamid': '76561198322287454', 'num_games_owned': 188, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 2483, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1699124279}
review:
I'm not entirely sure how it could take me years to understand the title but uh.. yeah. We start off as being chased as a prey. Why? An excellent question that the main character never bothered to ask. We get saved by strangers and while trying to introduce ourselves we notice we have amnesia (and maybe even lost personality cuz honestly this game is a bit outdated with the small, helpless girl next door).

pros;
- stunning visuals. i am really in awe with this artstyle even tho the game was made in 2013
- beautiful japanese voice acting (main character excluded ofc). the more you progress with the story the more inconsistent the voice acting gets sadly. it still happens a lot.. it just sometimes randomly stops
- a little repetitive music but the sound effects for objects were fitting (a moving chair, something being thrown, steps when someone is walking, ...)
- all of the guys had their charms when you are able to not take them too seriously. even the other characters were extremly unique and therefore amusing
- i really enjoyed the style of writing (third person and main character excluded *cough cough*)

neutral;
- in my opinion they could have included more routes (and achievements) but they give you a variety of endings tbf
- I was about to say that Axel was the most relatable since he didn't trust the main character blindly.. but.. "If the don ordered me to marry you, I would obey. ... Understand?" No, I really don't?!?!?! Q_Q
- also the irony when Axel reminded Gretel his name is Axel (instead of robot) but he keeps calling the main character "guest" :')
- love how no one cared to fill the main character in when she said "us girls" while actually adressing a guy
- not Hansel saying "So, I'm curious... Can you actually speak for yourself without being prompted?" Why even write her like that if you are just going to make fun of it ahhhh

cons;
- this game doesn't look like it was made for the pc. fullscreen is hella blurry for me
- i am not enitrely sure why the main character isn't bothered with this (i highly doubt she even got it) but they literally checked her body for a mark while she was passed out
- the main character is really nice but sounds a bit like a npc. constantly repeating certain phrases someone else said and kinda unbothered when people are being rude and ofc she's absolutely naive. a little quote about her: "I mean, you lied about it at first because you wanted to hide it, but now you're spilling your guts to me... and I'm someone you've only just met."
- since it's written in third-person it made it even harder for me to relate to the main character. i really don't understand why anyone would want to date her but hey, who am I to judge

Just don't take this game too serious and it's actually pretty funny. Not a must-have in my opinion but I'm really glad I got it. Highly recommend to buy it on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198315962118', 'num_games_owned': 211, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1018, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 370, 'last_played': 1672114163}

author: {'steamid': '76561198028105541', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 842, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 842, 'last_played': 1630639311}
review:
I love this game, I played all the non-oz mafia stories first. It sadden me that not everyone has a happy ending, but overall most people have two endings a really good one and a bittersweet one. You can't romance the catgirl. You befriend her in route. The main stories with the Tinman, The Lion, and the scarecrow were the hardest for me. They are the longest and you can switch and cheat on them. So I haven't 100% cause I can't bring myself to do anything cheating endings. My favorite guy is Soh, but my favorite route is Robinhood (it's sad. He's like Mr. Freeze from batman).

The Dorian Gray route is the most controversial. Minor Spoilers, Dorian Gray route takes place mostly in brothel. You willing go, you're not sold or something akin. You do become addicted to what happens at a brothel. It's a fun route, but it might be too much for some.

author: {'steamid': '76561199082466741', 'num_games_owned': 201, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 424, 'last_played': 1695557140}
review: 下载好几次，每次下完了打会儿就打不下去这白开水剧情然后卸载打别的去了。童话风+砂糖本应绝杀。尤其是三主推还是绿野仙踪，胆小的狮子，没有脑子的稻草人，无心的铁皮人，这太适合写恋爱剧情了。可能是由于英语&语音不全，可能是由于对剧本期待太高，总之遗憾。

author: {'steamid': '76561199036368350', 'num_games_owned': 228, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1669183773}
review:
[h1]推荐是出于尊重，实际上不建议任何价位购入[/h1]

※不含严重剧透，有软剧透，涉及内容太多不打码了
※额说到底这剧情根本没东西值得透，全告诉你也不影响体验

=============
这游戏似乎剧情太水了，打折也不值得买，有点犹豫，先试试，要是好之后再买，占个坑待编辑
-------------
去脑可食，我说的是屏幕外玩家的脑

美术：感觉画师钱没给够，杂线有点多，很明显偷懒想少画点cg，但是体感不细看是可以一玩的，精度是魔鬼恋人降低一档

剧情：目前看来是弱智，太弱智了，无力吐槽

公认雷点（NTR、3P之类）：长得都挺好看的，没有特别让我真情实感的，所以我觉得我可以，我都可以，不如说有什么线可以全泡的吗

=============

OzMafia通了于是说一句：有点拉，让我花钱我是不愿意的。

一是连全配音都没有，呃呃呃，你原价一百…你本子本来就一般，画面也不是最精美的，还没有全配音，配这个价格吗你…

二是剧本幼稚。真的很幼稚…这剧情纯是小孩子过家家啊？哪有敌对势力笑嘻嘻登门扔炸弹，事后当家的带人来滑跪，完了惩罚是什么跑腿扫大街，给对方花销掏钱之类的？你们这些黑手党，是来保护世界和平的？

三是美术好中带糙。画师是画魔鬼恋人的，画风一眼可辨，但是精度真是天差地别啊！个人感觉比魔鬼恋人的立绘、CG精度低了一个半档次。一些特写一看就没有好好画诶！到底给画师什么价格啊！指甲都画歪来真是笑死人了…头发上面杂线非常明显，有时候会有比较明显的人体崩坏，甚至有的地方没有CG，只有半屏幕特写来以假乱真。

简单来说：穷！按道理来说，一百一份的游戏，没有全语音，那画面得好点吧？看起来也没给美术这方面拨多少钱。全语音没有，画面也一般，那本子得有深度吧？本子像刚出道的小说家练笔作一样肤浅。你们这白花花的钞票是花到哪里去了啊？

四是感情线问题。重中之重的问题，前面都能忍，毕竟也有不少日乙是这样的。只有这个，堪称乙女里的一朵奇葩。

简单来说就是很突兀的NTR。

NTR！也不是不能接受，如果剧情安排得当合理的话，角色的选择改变能理解。但是不能说服玩家的话就是不可原谅的了。

你说二人共线这也不是很少见，呃，但是俩情侣都表白了定情了，事后被人撩拨一下就说其实不是真爱跟谁都无所谓啦然后就美美换对象了是什么操作啊…前后没超过两章诶…是想教导玩家“纸片人没有真爱”然后投入现实吗…好狡猾啊…

加之个人CG一条个人线1v1是拿不完的，必须得当一把黄毛（ntr名词）才能拿全，这就意味着——想拿到一个我推的全CG，必须要先推一遍我推纯爱线（有另外一个角色虎视眈眈随时可能抢人）看我推和别人搞一波雄竞，再打一遍（两遍）其他角色的移情别恋线，前期和其他男主搞对象，后期换对象到我推——如果策划确实要这么搞，为什么要把前面的剧情写得那么纯情啊！前面那些感情的流露都是演的？或者在其他地方女主对其他人其实也这样？好像骗一般纯爱玩家进来杀似的！看不起专偶人是吧！就算要搞取向开放的，普世道德还是相对赞同专偶的（抛开性资源之类的严肃话题不谈），这样当螃蟹趴开走路，路走窄了呃。

说到底，你他娘的一个童话背景题材，不让玩家追求童话一般一生一世永不变心的纯爱，反而乐颠颠地跑去搞三角恋：要是我需要这种剧情为什么要来玩你游…不是，哪有人需要这种啊！

平心而论，几男争一女的游戏还不少见吗？看看人家兄弟战争？看看人家魔鬼恋人2？哪有被骂成你这样的？人家也不搞告白后换对象这烂活倒是。在我看来，告白后换对象就有点像在告诉一般普通玩家：女主其实没那么爱这个人，换个人也行，你（玩家）喜欢的角色根本不是独一无二的。打个游戏，乙女游戏，不让我脱离尘世纷扰，放松身心，享受纯粹的感情，或者因为剧情伤情到痛哭发泄，反而要狠狠打我的思想观念一巴掌，这谁不生气啊…

何况我还要为这一巴掌花100块钱（打折50）。

就我目前玩到的剧情里面，前有苦主痛苦地说你跟我不会幸福不如去跟黄毛吧我是废物你跟他过比较好，后有黄毛说没事你先跟我在一起，感情是可以培养的，再然后女主就真答应了，让推倒让摸让抱的，好吧，你这ntr剧情挺丰富，有点没想到哈…

个人而言NTR其实无所谓。主要是很扯啊。第二点加上第四点让这个“创新”变得非常致命，喜欢的人和不喜欢的人根本没法互相和解。NTR的要素没有让这个故事变得深刻，变得现实，反而让这个故事更加丧失逻辑，所有人都丧失逻辑，都沉浸在一种莫名的愚蠢的爱欲中，毁掉了这个故事最后的一点点好处。

它不配我为之花100块，真的。也不值得任何人花这100块来找不痛快，如果你不是那么喜欢ntr并且不会奔着ntr来的话。就算半价50也不值。

author: {'steamid': '76561199130499076', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1384, 'last_played': 1668865026}
review: This game has made me feel many emotions ngl, I love the art style and the mystical feel to it, I have played it multiple times and I will continue to play it more, it is 100% one of my favorite Otome games, I have an attachment to a few of the characters, I think any game that can make me have an attachment is a great stunning game <33, for anyone who likes Otome games, I recommend this!

author: {'steamid': '76561198170824237', 'num_games_owned': 119, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2569, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2569, 'last_played': 1612661268}
review: ***WARNING - GAME NOT FOR EVERYONE**** This is the very definition of a problematic fav for me. This game is disturbing, the MC is an idiot and some of the routes are straight up bizarre. Some routes should have trigger warnings (mentions of SA and Death). Despite all this, Ozmafia is so compelling and well paced that it remains one of my favorite otome games. I find alot of similar themed otome games a chore to get through, but Ozmafia is so fast at getting into the good stuff. Also the art is gorgeous.

author: {'steamid': '76561199129885609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1652737006}
review:
I know I probably should not write this review cause...well, I played only for 1.4h, but no matter how hard I tried, I just can't do it...and trust me, not for lack of trying.
I tried 4 times to continue, but every single time I felt almost physical pain by being stubbed with the most cliche lines of dialogues, character traits and story development I have ever seen in Otome.

Take my review with the grain of salt (cause I obviously didn't finish), but I can say with 99.6% I regretted this purchase.

author: {'steamid': '76561198386661383', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 2161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1989, 'last_played': 1659913719}
review: The dialogue in this game is very well written and absolutely hillarious. I can't count the times I laughed out loud. Also this game has a lot to offer and amazing LI's too. Not to mention how pretty the art is. I highly recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198268497994', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 988, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 922, 'last_played': 1659428372}
review:
- I liked parts of this game (the art is beautiful and the writing is funny) but I think it would have been better if it had focused in on about half as many routes. Some of the routes seem like normal, funny otome game routes, while others are either boring or disturbing.  
- The main character is probably the worst "ignorant of the world and incapable of taking care of herself" type of character I have ever seen. The only thing this girl can do is laundry. She can't cook or fight or sing well or do any job or talent. When characters insult her, it's kind of like "Well, can't argue with you there. She really can't be trusted to do anything." At the end it's revealed she is like this because [spoiler] she's a child in an adult body [/spoiler], which... did not make the game better.
- The audio is very bizarre. Within scenes, dialogue cuts in and out of being voiced or un-voiced. I would have preferred those scenes to not be voiced at all over the weird hybrid version. 
- I did not like being forced to play the brothel route or the love triangle routes to finish the game, I wish there was an option to skip those. 
- The game is very long and some of the routes dragged on. 
- More than any of that though, I have serious issues with the [spoiler] drugging/date rape [/spoiler] in Robin Hood's route and the implications of a character that is seen in many routes having sex actually being [spoiler] a child that is magically pretending to be older [/spoiler]. WTF were the writers thinking? It is rare that an epilogue will make the whole rest of the game feel dirty to me, but this game pulled it off.
- This pales in comparison with the above issue, but some of the love interests were revealed to be totally bizarre things. [spoiler] Caesar is a part of the main character and Soh is a combination of a tower and the main character's dead dog. [/spoiler] Again, WTF?!

author: {'steamid': '76561199068078537', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4041, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3495, 'last_played': 1686164763}
review:
Bem . . . como começar essa análise, KKKKKKK. Indo direto ao ponto: o jogo em si não é exatamente uma obra prima dos deuses, mas não vou dizer que é um jogo ruim, também. Ele tem seus pontos positivos e seus pontos negativos como qualquer jogo. Pessoalmente falando, é um jogo que me entretém bastante (acho um jogo gostoso pra passar o tempo). O plot em si é uma salada de temas que são um tanto comuns de se verem jogos do gênero sendo produzidos (máfia, contos de fada... é basicamente um combo desses dois). Alguns personagens têm aqueles arquétipos clássicos que, se você assiste anime (ou lê mangás) ou já jogou dating sims japoneses, vai identificar meio fácil. O jogo tem . . . MUUUUITAS rotas. E se você pega pelo menos um final de cada, você desbloqueia o Grand Finale do jogo, que é o encerramento de tudo + esclarecimento de certas coisas que você vai descobrindo enquanto joga as rotas (eu ainda não consegui, retomei o jogo recentemente pra conseguir porque a esse ponto, virou questão de honra).

De todas as rotas que joguei até o momento (eu só não joguei a do Scarlet, nem a da Pachet e estou jogando a do Soh), diria que só uma REALMENTE não me agradou: a do Robin Hood. A do Brothel é . . . . . . bem. O propósito dela certamente não é o mesmo das outras. Mas aviso de antemão que tanto a do Brothel quanto a do Robin Hood lidam com uns assuntos bem pesados e podem ser desconfortáveis de serem jogadas. A do Robin Hood, especialmente, foi uma que me deixou bem desconfortável, ouso dizer que até mais do que a do Brothel (mas essa eu joguei sabendo que era bizarra, então eu já esperava bizarrice). 

Acho que uma das minhas críticas gerais em relação às rotas é que algumas delas são beeeeem curtas em relação às três principais (Caramia, Kyrie & Axel). E algo que é meio chatinho no jogo é que há uma repetição de cenas e eventos constante no jogo depois que você joga ele pela primeira vez sem ter lido nenhum diálogo: e eu diria que foi essa repetição, inclusive, que acabou estragando um pouquinho a Brothel Route pra mim. Porque parecia que o que tinha acontecido meio que não importava muito (?), cortava completamente o clima tenso e a imersão que estava sendo construída nas cenas de foco da rota. Além disso, lembra que eu disse que as rotas que não são as três principais são meio curtinhas? Então... Elas são curtinhas justamente porque tem toda essa repetição de eventos da história antes. Acaba que as cenas de foco na rota são poucas, pelo menos até chegar um ponto do jogo onde ele tá focando 100% na rota que você escolheu. Also, o jogo tem muitas transições que eu considero um pouquinho desgastantes. Especialmente em cenas que deveriam conter ação ou algo assim. Ou às vezes numa cena comum mesmo em que eu gostaria de mais um pouco de desenvolvimento, aí cortam do nada e mudam pra outra totalmente diferente, sem concluir a que passou.

Quanto à protagonista... Bem. Tem vezes que eu quero dar um berrão com ela e tem vezes que eu acabo rindo com ela justamente por ela ter dois neurônios funcionais. E também por ela realmente meio que nem se importar quando alguém fala na cara dela que ela é meio tonta. Incrivelmente, eu não tenho exatamente raiva dela, nem acho ela uma péssima personagem, porque já meio que vi heroines piores nos outros jogos do gênero que eu joguei... Mas entendo que não é todo mundo que aguenta, não.

Enfim, o jogo é divertido, devo dizer isso. Eu pessoalmente gosto do plot, acho ele criativo, e sou uma cadelinha de contos de fada. Pessoalmente não ligo muito pra plot de máfia, mas eu acho meio engraçado como isso foi encaixado de um jeito meio aleatório na temática. Não acho que é o melhor jogo que já joguei, mas não acho que seja o pior também. A arte é bem bonita, gosto da dublagem, tem momentos bem fofinhos e românticos, clichêzinhos bem gostosos... Mas é um jogo que acaba te enganando um pouco ou te pegando de surpresa às vezes, porque tem uns vários momentos bem sombrios ali. Completar as rotas de pouco em pouco acaba sendo até que fácil por conta da repetição de eventos (incrivelmente, embora eu não goste disso de repetir demais os eventos por, justamente, querer um desenvolvimento diferente pra cada escolha tomada na história, essa repetição acaba ajudando em alguns pontos), mas diria que leva algum bom tempo aí até você ir completando tudinho e "zerar" o jogo.

Eu sinceramente acho que recomendaria comprar o jogo numa promoção, como eu mesma fiz, por achar que compensa mais, mesmo. Eu meio que comprei na pura curiosidade mesmo porque tava bem baratinho por conta da promoção na época, nem vi nada exatamente do jogo, só vi que era um otome game e, como uma grande fã do gênero, corri atrás.

Enfim, vou finalizar isso com um: Caesar & Axel best boys (um beijo pro Hamelin também, chorei horrores na rota dele).

author: {'steamid': '76561199185230277', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4700, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4494, 'last_played': 1700447307}
review:
When i first started playing this game, i didn't think i would end up liking it as much as i do now.
Even though most of the characters were quite likeable to me, the story seemed kinda boring, but actually it is a lot more interesting than what it seems to be at the beginning.
I loved how diverse the endings are, and i'm even talking about the ones that were kinda questionable.
If you like trashy fictional men, unnecesary drama and heartbreaking angst, this game is for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198196394227', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 3139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3139, 'last_played': 1657579331}
review: The MC is sooooooooooooo air headed. Casual sexual assault where no one is ever punished for doing it. It makes you repeat things over and over and over just to see the ultimate ending. The writing is not the best and the game is INCREDIBLY SEXIST. Fat shaming, so much of it. Some of it isn't really shaming, its just harsh reality, but another part of the shaming is awful shit like oh I wont like you if you get too big. THE MC LITERALLY APOLOGIZES FOR EATING WITH EXUBERANCE. Oh Im sorry Ill be more careful so you still wanna DO ME. The only high points are the art, the Soh and Caesar and Hamelin story lines. And the art. The art is lovely. Also they have to many transition screens in between moments. I played this as much as I did because I couldnt stand the idea of having wasted 35 bucks, Do yourself a favor and dont buy this... Cinderella Phenomenon is way better.

author: {'steamid': '76561198880586404', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 673, 'last_played': 1657426819}
review:
I like this game but I've also heard some criticism so here's my takeaways
 as a disclaimer I've only played thru Caramia and Kyrie's routes fully, so I'm definitely not like, an expert on this game yet.
1) Don't treat this game TOO seriously. Honestly I've been treating it as just something chill to play when I have nothing else to do, so don't come into it expecting the most mind boggling plot you've ever seen in an otome game.

2) The story (at least what I have played) can be a tad repetitive, and also seems kind of fragmented at times just because of how the game kind of splits the story up into "scenes". It's not so fragmented that you can't tell whats going on though.

3) the route tree can be kind of annoying to navigate. There's a bunch of routes and each have two endings (which i'm gonna be honest, unless i'm really messing something up, both route endings are almost exactly the same with a few minor differences) and there's stuff like love triangles to navigate so it's a bit overwhelming at first. Also the game isn't exactly obvious at times when it comes to which ending you got or are heading towards.

4) You'll want to save a lot, preferably at the beginning of every route split. This mostly just applies to the three Oz boys because there's love triangles and you can transfer to a different love interest than the one you're currently pursuing, and again sometimes the game isn't helpful with figuring how to stay on certain routes. Some are easier to figure out than others, in Caramia's route it's pretty easy to figure out how to stay on his route and not get onto the transfer route, but in Kyrie's route I had to start over 4 times because I kept accidentally ending up with Caramia. 

5) Fuka is about as dumb as a box of rocks. Like if you absolutely hate dense MCs you will not like this game haha. I kinda brush it off as her just being clueless because of amnesia, but you will be yelling at the screen sometimes at how stupid she can be. 

So all in all, as much as it has it's flaws, I do like this game, but also just come into it with caution if any of the above points set you off because I can recognize it's not for everyone haha. I also wouldn't recommend as a introduction to Otome games, because as simple as the plot is, as far as the route structure goes there's a lot going on that might get overwhelming if you're not used to it. But if you are a fan of Otome game's already and are ok with something a little less riveting plot-wise, you might find this a fun game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198958941872', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2134, 'last_played': 1654629912}
review:
Honestly ozmafia has one of the most complicated ending tree(for the main 3). I really loved it! Just sad I couldn't date Pashet :(( 
Recommend if you have time to waste, so far the only otome game that I couldn't finish in one sitting and made me think about it for weeks before I could finally move on to the next.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077895541', 'num_games_owned': 78, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1577, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1577, 'last_played': 1656037739}
review:
If you are wondering  if you should or not get this game, then the Answer is "YES".
Ozmafia has great art, music and story telling. It wont make you cry as other otome games, but it will give you that nice fluffy feeling of playing a fun Otoge. This game has a huge variety of love interests and i love how their personalities and looks are unique.
There's also a unique feature here which is allowing you to swap routes ongoing for the 3 main ML's, which is gold and gives you a more Adult vibe and Hilarious dialogues.
The translation is clean of typos and greatly adapted. There was a great work of the localization team here.
So yeah, Ozmafia is great and really Worth it.
#Team Kyrie Forever

author: {'steamid': '76561198196246225', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1654926296}
review:
I'm not very far in, I'm still hoping the game will at some point become more enjoyable... That being said I don't think I've played an otome game with a dumber protagonist than the one in this game. I'm trying, I really am. But sometimes it's really hard to immerse yourself in a setting where the character you're experiencing that setting through is an absolute idiot. It feels like she abuses the privilege of being a damsel in distress while also being an amnesiac. 

On the plus side the art is pretty. Not the best but definitely still pretty. 

(I'll update this review once I manage to beat a route but i'm not sure when that'll be.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198281683255', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 801, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 801, 'last_played': 1654742378}
review:
I don't know, maybe this one was just overhyped for me having seen so many people talk about it on reddit. 

Art is pretty, but stagnant in this strange way where the characters never feel fluid. 
Music is super annoying. Really. It's bad. 
Writing is a solid 4/10. The plot points weren't just predictable, they were outright stupid in some places, and not in a fun way. 

Made it through 2 routes and just have to drop it. 4/10 overall.

author: {'steamid': '76561198199594654', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 410, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 410, 'last_played': 1654049470}
review:
This is an extremely disappointing PC exclusive otome game, especially given that it is a premium priced game. I have played for roughly 7 hours, finishing 5 endings spread across 3 character routes (Caramia, Hamelin, and the rent boys). 

I would be hard pressed to describe the plot to you because it doesn't really have one, but here goes. A nameless young woman awakens in an alley. She can remember nothing. A man appears who is trying to kill her. She flees, only to find safety when she encounters the three chief members of the Oz family, one of several fairy tale themed mafia organizations trying to control the city. Caramia (the cowardly lion), Kyrie (scarecrow) and Axel (tin man) offer to let her let live in their base. 

From here, the heroine interacts with characters. Events happen. But nothing feels like it has structure or cohesion. Scenes are short, most can be cleared in about 5 to 10 minutes, and are often choppy, with the scenario ending in awkward places like fading to black in just as a fight scene is starting or making a big deal about a beauty pageant only for the next scene to be the aftermath of the contest. 

It seems this may be one of those games where the true ending ties everything together after you've seen every character's route, but the game has a ton of characters with most of them having at least 2 endings. I don't have it in me to replay a game that is only so-so at best that many times to see if it has some kind of a point. And I can not fathom that any true end would feel less piece meal than the rest of the game. 

Another thing that annoys me about it is that it is one of those ones that are partially voice acted and which sections get spoken dialogue is arbitrary at best. Some scenes will start out silent, only to gain voice acting in the middle while others are the complete opposite. There is no consistency.

This is not the worst otome game I've ever played, but it's close to it. It is limp, lifeless, and meandering. Unless you have played absolutely every other otome game on Steam and it's your life goal to play everything available in English, this is one to avoid.

author: {'steamid': '76561198284600559', 'num_games_owned': 118, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 4878, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3655, 'last_played': 1664967934}

I absolutely love the game. Sure it has little falters here and there. But over all I'd recommend it. It has interesting routes which leads to inevitable dead ends or kind of make your stereotypical fairy tail endings fade. 
I know there are many bad opinions out there but I'd recommend it without a doubt, I think this and Nightshade are the only VN's that had me bawling in tears♥.

或者是走那个猎奇的妓院线，但是！口是心非的傲娇狼崽更好吃，嘻嘻嘻。表面冷冰冰，尾巴却在背后疯狂摇动。点餐那里真实心动了，别人是恶心的三明治，我是蛋包饭。最重要是白发嘻嘻嘻嘻。对不起了小猫咪，本来百合我也很有兴趣的说~

还有隐藏角色，拜托，操控系真的很弱好不好。果断放弃，我才不要为了他去守大门，呸。

author: {'steamid': '76561198004566567', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 2409, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2409, 'last_played': 1647048750}
review:
Huh.
I'm still trying to decide about this one. But since I was on the edge of my seat for a little while there, I'm going to recommend it. The voice acting is very good, and the story-book-esque art grows on you. It's not repetitive in the way that many VNs are when you have to go through each route skipping all the read text, and that's a huge bonus. I prefer to experience a different story with each new route, and you do that in Ozmafia for the most part. 
But there are a couple routes that were--unnecessary? They didn't really add anything to the story and in retrospect were downright disturbing. And not in a cool way. With the "brothel route" I guess you can figure out what you're getting in to, but there's a couple other unsuspecting routes that get dark quick. And you can't avoid these routes if you want to unlock the actual ending of the game.
Also, it's not possible to take screenshots in Steam, probably so there won't be spoilers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198321423225', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 373, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 373, 'last_played': 1647914094}
review: A personagem principal é estúpida e irritante, a história não tem profundidade assim como os interesses amorosos.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998985593', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1648339812}
review:
Really short game if you're just playing one particular route, I got through Kyrie's in 3 hours. 
It has cute and engaging characters, MC is comically stupid which is fun. The plot isn't deep or exciting, but it's entertaining.
Idk what people in the reviews are talking about when they call the game sexual or triggering, there is no sexual content beyond characters flirting or implied cutaway sex when you date a character (btw also no 18+ patch, the game is just like this)
If you're just interested in flirting with cute boys in a Wizard of Oz setting then this game's for you, maybe just wait until it goes on sale because the regular price is a bit high for what you're getting. It should be around $11 like Amnesia, which has much more content.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123532318', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1805, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1805, 'last_played': 1618008411}
review: One of my favorite otome games of all time. I love otome games that are just absolutely wild. The kind where you play a route in utter disbelief of every development and can barely explain it to your friends. There are at least 3 of those routes here. There's a delightful mix of heartwarming, cute romance, sad dramatic moments, and absolutely unhinged plotlines. I find the writing and translation to be quite good. And this is somewhat of an unpopular opinion but I adore Fuka as an MC. She is hilarious.

author: {'steamid': '76561199212006055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 782, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 782, 'last_played': 1647106211}
review:
Spoiler!

Uhm to be honest the artstyle is really cute but I am still cautious when it comes to the characters I don't know I feel like I can't trust them. Soh and Scarlet are the ones I immediately thought like: Yeah they look nice!
I also slowly began to trust Caramia(?)  more and Axel is just a softie which I really liked.
I am not far with the storyline yet so I will mention the things that really caught my attention and also somehow bothered me.
First of all the MC looks really cute but she is so.. dumb? I know she has amnesia but I generally don't like it when the MC isn't really that smart, but many otome games sadly have mcs like that, newer ones get more confident ones now which I love. It just makes women seem more natural and not that weak

Mhm what else. I think the intercourse scenes triggered me the most because I didn't expect that they would be a part of it. Especially the brothels one was hard for me to digest, I know it's my fault for continuing but I just wanted to play all routes and kind of regret playing that one. So to asexuals or people who get really uncomfortable with  things such as these, I recommend you to skip that part

All in all I am still pretty neutral but I like Soh the most so far because he seems like the softest.
I hope I will open up to more characters soon I really don't feel that comfortable with them yet

author: {'steamid': '76561198253049100', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2806, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2806, 'last_played': 1613714633}
review:
SA Trigger warning for OZMAFIA
I personally quite liked this game. There are a few boring points in the story and it can get a bit repetitive when doing multiple routes, The MC is annoyingly stupid but after playing so many Otome games I've become able to ignore that for the most part. My biggest complaints lie in the Robin hood and Brothel stories. Brothel was creepy in expected ways considering the context, [spoiler] The ending where she takes over the brothel is a real Girlboss move [/spoiler], though it was still incredibly unsettling. Robin hoods route really threw me though. His actions were unacceptable and the fact that they got a pass is absolutely disgusting. 

Despite ALLLLL of this I still am saying I recommend it. Though there are many flaws I did quite enjoy the humor and the art was utterly gorgeous, and as long as you don't play the two aforementioned routes the characters are all quite enjoyable. The final story brings everything together pretty well giving at least some kind of glue to the weirdly loose plot of the game. Overall, I give it a 7/10. I would wait for a sale before buying however.

author: {'steamid': '76561198995935168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2649, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2555, 'last_played': 1646353738}
review: I'm a 100% completionist and thoroughly enjoyed Ozmafia, from plot to the gorgeous artwork. However, the long, and I mean long and boring (after you've seen it the first time) common route drags when you're trying to collect all CGs. Some endings can be lacklustre, however as a game I found it very enjoyable with a nice ending.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137201402', 'num_games_owned': 215, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1645294098}
review:
首先非常非常感谢夜鸮的树洞汉化组，能让我玩上汉化的版本。
OZMAFIA是一部取材于童话的游戏，整体故事基于《绿野仙踪》的基础设定开始，加入了格林童话、安徒生童话、王尔德童话、海蒂、穿靴子的猫等耳熟能详的童话人物元素，并在此基础上进行了二次创作，是我个人很喜欢的创意。

但整体展开不是很合我的口味，一是过场太多太多（多到让人崩溃，过场可以按ctrl跳过），把剧情分割得有点零碎，再加上攻略人物是采用选择和他/她见面然后进行下一步的这种日常聊天模式，玩起来有种不连贯的感觉，在真相线之前的一些剧情冲突往往让人有点摸不着头脑，可能玩着玩着就觉得“啊？怎么突然这样了？”这种感觉。抛开这些的话，优点在于一些日常的细节描写还挺有趣，人物的前后反差也有萌点。在走完所有角色的线之后，真相线和最后的结局线的故事也增加了不少游戏体验。（对故事的感受因人而异~）

当然最喜欢的还是砂糖太太的画风，CG绝美！！女主的对话框头像一如既往画得超级超级可爱！

游戏的特色换乘玩法还挺新颖的，对换乘玩法的三个攻略角色除了可以单独走纯爱线到底之外，还可以走到一半时排列组合式地劈腿，每条线都可以劈腿另外两个角色。相信很多人都是被这个玩法吸引入坑的。关于换乘玩法有两点想吐槽下：
1、每个人物在另外两人的线掺和一脚时剧情基本一致，其实这里根据被劈腿角色的不同可以丰富一些人物和剧情的细节。
2、每个人物在自己的线比较矜持，在别人的劈腿线却分外火热（？）
我的内心：野啊宝贝，还有两副面孔呢？

除了OZ三人组之外的其他角色线相对而言比较短小，因此感情进展感觉和坐飞机一样快，但还是可以狠狠地get到一些角色的可爱，喜欢索，猫姐还有哈梅尔（哈梅尔CG画那么帅居然剧情如此短小实在是太可惜了）。
[spoiler] 猫姐不能百合我太伤心了 [/spoiler]
娼馆三人组线比较另类，看这个名字大家心里应该也有数了，请做好心理准备再玩。

ED曲子Dare To Believe太好听了！！想跟看到的每一个人安利！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198066279915', 'num_games_owned': 42, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 4207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4204, 'last_played': 1645866183}
review:
This is a game that I both love and hate because:

Pros:
- Most characters are fun and I love learning more about them, including the side character.
- Interesting isekai mafia theme.
- Beautiful art, CGs, & bgm.
- Many options & route. All got different ending & epilogue. Plus a grand finale ending explaining the world setting.

Cons:
- typical otoge no brainer heorine. I really meant it when I said no brain.
- The fighting scene aren't that satisfying.
- Super long common route.
- Got some weird a&& route but I will take it (I AM LOOKING AT YOU ALFANI, you scammerboi).
- Loading Scene: whoever idea is this, I hate you. The color is so blinding. There are so many of it and consider the story super long length, it became sooooooooooooooooo painful to look at. Specially, from the 2nd playthough onward cause it takes forever to skip.

Route review:
- Caramia: Always a gentleman/likable in every route.
- Kyrie: I hate him at first since I was playing Caramia route, but I find him likable in this own route. His sarcastic tone kinda fun to read.
- Axel: Tsundere sweet lover guy with sweet personality <3
- Scarlet: somehow cannot look at him in a romantic way, he's more like cute a guy friend.
- Caesar: I don't like him so I find his route quite boring
- Soh: Thought he's a yandere but guess not. He's sweet.
- Pashet: cute nekomimi girl friend, why not?
- Robin Hood: got some tragic past, but he's sweat and kind. A bit surprised by what's behind that door though.
- Brothel: so weird that I find it funny so I'll take that (I MEANT THE GOOD ENDING ONE, the other is meh).
- Hamelin: OTOGE loop of every game always made me like the secret character and give me a short route but I enjoy it thoroughly .

If you could endure all the cons then this game is for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198859516835', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 778, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 409, 'last_played': 1644250644}

author: {'steamid': '76561198118174202', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1102, 'last_played': 1643946020}
review:
I'm sorry, I'm such a huge Otome fan, have been for years but this is my first time leaving a negative review because I just can't deal with the amount of stupid I got from playing this game. Like I seriously lost brain cells from this. At the time of writing this review I poured almost 20hours, which equals to 4 routes (Pure endings) but i'm serioulsy not motivated to keep going. The world and the characters are painfully blend, the lack of depth makes it very difficult to fully immerse yourself in the story. I can appreciate an amnesiac but only if i am given some sort of ways to recover the memories or at the very least understand what the MC is doing in that world. In this particular game, not only is the MC suffering from amnesia, she doesn't even seem to be part of the world initially (no house brand), she has no particlar skills and her amnesia is so complete that it's truthfully a miracle she even knows how to speak and read. 

The story is blend, there's no action, no drama, no ways to further understand this whole Mafia thing. Where did MC come from? The main antagonist arrives like 5minutes before the end and is put out just as quickly. MC just goes with the flow, has no ambitions, no desires, no redeeming qualities or even the IQ to survive unless someone is accompanying her.

I can't in good conscience recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198910673740', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1641972605}

author: {'steamid': '76561198183776325', 'num_games_owned': 243, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 449, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 449, 'last_played': 1641063709}
review:
Зачем пихать загрузку и название игры каждые 10 минут геймплея?

Из хорошего: сейю, милый визуальный стиль (хотя мне показался немного "слащавым"), стилистика под сказки - Волшебник из страны Оз, сказки Братьев Гримм и тд., большой выбор "кандидатов".

Из плохого: 
- Сюжет. Он какой-то глупый.. Конфликты в рутах персонажей возникают просто с пустого места, получается т.н."буря в стакане", которая разрешается также быстро, как и появилась. В чем тогда смысл?
- Глупая и наивная главная героиня.

На любителя.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027851984', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 853, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 747, 'last_played': 1679448434}
review:
I never write reviews, but I feel inclined to share my thoughts since some reviewers have some...strong feelings towards the game. 

OZMAFIA is a charming game, despite it's mishaps. The art itself makes it worthwhile playing through, the voice acting is good, and the soundtrack is decent. The characters are in depth and well written, but it is the story, events, and MC that makes the game falter. Despite this, I still recommend this if its on sale. 

...A main concern from potential players is TRIGGERING CONTENT. But this can be easily avoided as the game warns you multiple times to avoid certain routes. Several routes (Axel, Caramia, Pashet, Soh) have explicit consent and healthy relationship, but completionists may feel uncomfortable.

And for those who are planning on playing, I'll outline some game info since the game explains 0 mechanics. 

Whats a TRANSFER end and a PURE end?: In the Oz family, and ONLY the Oz family, the two men with the most affection points will attempt to court you. TRANSFER means that you start with someone, but decide going with another man. A PURE end means you commit to a man for the whole game. 

LOADING SCREENS. They're slightly annoying, but there is a reason for them. An icon with the whole gang with a GOLD trim means a normal time skip, an icon with the gang with a BLUE trim means new content (when you are replaying) and a loading screen with the Oz family means a love triangle. When a character is highlighted RED, it means you will pick their route in the love triangle.

ANSWERING CORRECTLY: To get a good end, quicksave and click on the answer that gives you a jingle sound. If you don't hear a jingle, it means you either picked wrong or the answer didn't count for affection points. When in doubt, reload your quicksave.

I loved OZMAFIA, and I'll probably pick it back up later for other routes. But as an otome game goes, its strikingly beautiful with loveable characters, which is enough to make my buy it.

review:
I haven't finish all route yet but,
- Beautiful art style
- The CGs
- The characters
- Tons of option
- Lots of route
- Different ending for each route
- Relaxing BGM

Really worth for what I paid for, however there could be some improvement:
- Steam achievement to track progress
- Higher resolution on fullscreen mode
- Enable steam screenshots

I don't really do reviews but this one so far is the best otome game I have ever played so, I thought leaving few words wouldn't hurt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198967960428', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 375, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1638420712}
review: I just started playing, and have about 3 hours in. From what I can tell already, the common route is pretty lengthy, and the story is funny and light. I can see some dark undertones coming through, and I am super excited to unravel them all. I love the almost watercolor style of art here, and I'll update my review once I've played through them all. It's more adult than the most game's in the genre I've played, and sometimes the voice acting just cuts out randomly, and you are left reading in silence, but other than that, so far it's super cute and while a lot of the complaints are about the MC and how she's "stupid" I just don't see it yet. She suffers from memory loss and is in a "new" world that doesn't seem familiar to her. OF COURSE, she's going to be lacking some intell there, but also, I've played a LOT of these games where the MC is hesitant, doesn't think for themselves, changes her persona with every LI, and is very frustrating. They tend to be overly incompetent, clumsy, and have 0 hobbies or self-interests. At least here it seems like she has some substance over other games I have played. The OZ and fairy tale troupe is not too overdone, especially since OZ usually gets left out of otome troupes. It's nice to see. The music is  AMAZING! I liked it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198068556208', 'num_games_owned': 414, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 1869, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1869, 'last_played': 1637442228}
review:
[h1] Сказочная ОПГ [/h1]

Видит Мерлин, я мечтала поставить Озмафии хорошую оценку. Ради новых отомэ в Стиме и ради прекрасных переводчиков, благодаря стараниям которых я не мучила мозг тридцать часов. Но… не получилось. 

Сперва о хорошем:

❤️ В игре чудесная графика. Исполнение некоторых CG кривовато, но дизайн персонажей просто волшебный. Их спрайты вы точно ни с какими другими не перепутаете. 

❤️ На выбор дается целых десять сказочных героев, с которыми можно строить отношения, в том числе и  неромантического характера.  В-основном, диалоги с ними живенькие, особенно в моменты повседневности – а именно они и занимают львиную долю игры. Озвучка неплохая, хотя слышно, что не все актеры стараются.

Если вышеупомянутых пунктов вам достаточно, чтобы хорошо провести время, то от прочтения можно получить удовольствие. Что я и делала в те моменты, когда не было нервирующих факторов:

💔 Главная героиня – фееричная тупица. Подобный тип протагонистов меня не раздражает, но в данном случае это проблема, так как глупость Фуки – чуть ли не единственная вещь, которая пинает к финалу коматозника, гордо зовущегося здесь «основным сюжетом». Когда же ей это удается, того так сильно скрючивает от нелогичности и скомканности происходящего, что к пятому часу начинаешь мечтать пристрелить его собственноручно, чтобы не мучился.

💔 Среди романсабельных персонажей есть несколько неплохих рутов, которые мне понравились. К сожалению, к таковым не относится основное трио долб… кхе-кхе… трио Семьи Оз. Сами по себе они славные ребята, но кому-то из сценаристов пришла гениальная идея сделать любовные треугольники обязательным пунктом их программы. Затея, конечно, интересная, но в итоге получились лишь неправдоподобные привязанности, высосанные из пальца конфликты и часы перепрохождения. Спасибо, что есть гайд, а то в сказочную страну верхом на огненном тайфуне улетела бы уже я сама.

💔 Не знаю, проблема это игры или перевода, но часто у меня было ощущение, что диалоги прерываются слишком уж внезапно. Учитывая структуру новеллы, это не баг, а фича, но было странно.

Вердикт: В стиме нет оценки «мэйби», но если бы была, я бы поставила именно ее. У игры есть, чем развлечь – неплохо проработанные характеры, диалоги, юмор. Не самая ужасная отомэ, все-таки я прошла ее полностью, но и очень хорошей ее назвать язык не поворачивается. Если и проходить ее, то только из целей прикоснуться к классике.

author: {'steamid': '76561198933078903', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 223, 'last_played': 1637097655}
review:
Disclaimer: Todavía no lo termino. Vamos directo a lo que importa:

-Lo bueno:
El arte es precioso, creo que de todos los otomes que he jugado hasta ahora es el que tiene los mejores CGs. El diseño de los personajes también es bellísimo, representa a los personajes sin ser cursi/estereotipado. Normalmente no suelen llamarme la atención más de 2 personajes en un otome pero en el caso de Ozmafia hay solo un par que NO me llaman la atención. Todos los personajes se ven muy bien. Hablando de personajes, es muy divertido verlos interactuar entre sí, algunas escenas sí que me hicieron reír, como todas las peleas tontas de Caramia y Kyrie. El juego es claro al mostrar la dinámica entre los personajes de las distintas casas y es una de sus características más positivas.

-Lo malo:
Poca continuidad en la narración. Las escenas duran muy poco, a cada rato hay una pantalla de carga que al cabo de unas horas ya cansa mucho. Lo peor es cuando hay una escena de pelea, queda en una parte importante, te meten una pantalla de carga y luego otra escena que nada que ver. Esto hace que por momentos resulte muy confuso el paso del tiempo y el orden cronológico de los eventos.
Las rutas pueden sentirse apresuradas y cortas. Tienen un buen inicio, la ruta de Axel es preciosa, pero el final resultó algo decepcionante. La otra ruta que hice fue la de Caesar y esa sí me decepcionó mucho, fue muy apresurado el romance y por eso siento que también se quedó corta. 

Opinión final: Vale la pena comprarlo si está en oferta. Es entretenido, es bonito visualmente, los personajes son divertidos... y no hay mucho más que decir. De todos modos lo recomiendo porque si vas con pocas expectativas, lo vas a disfrutar. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198063612924', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 3320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3320, 'last_played': 1636925664}
review:
Recien termino de jugar y llegar al 100%. Me llevo 55hs.
La verdad que no tenia grandes espectativas. La sinopsis me parecia muy rara.
Me alegra decir que encontre una joya en este juego.
La historia por momentos es entretenida, por momentos es triste y por momentos emotiva.
Una narración MUY bien escrita, y me GUSTA que hay TRIANGULOS amorosos ajajaja.
En esta historia no todo tiene un final feliz, y eso para mi es un plus. Claro que no me gusta sufrir, pero si me gusta que haya este tipo de sopresas, no todo termina bien, no siempre todo es feliz.
la recomiendo? 100%,

Desde el arte, la historia, los personajes. No tengo nada de que quejarme.
Si buscas un juego Otome completo, este es el tuyo, no te vas a arrepentir.
