review: I really like this otome game! I've completely almost all of it probably got about 2 hours to complete it. So far I've played it 49 hours. Thats with skipping some read text too! At first when I started this game I didn't think I would like it but then I got sucked in lol. It's cute, funny, disturbing, sweet, tearful and defiantly gets your emotions going. I love how they incorporated so many children tales into this and the art is really good. I like that its more on the hand drawn side too. Only down fall is you have to use snip tool to take screen shots. The hours you put into the game is defiantly worth the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198867181758', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 1594, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1149, 'last_played': 1630794610}
review:
This is going to be long so as a TL;DR - Good game. Turn off cloud saves to avoid corrupted saves, run in windowed to avoid random crashes, and it's all good to go. EDIT: Also tw for the brothel route for MC being drugged, sexual content, and noncon/implied noncon.

Overall, the game has been very enjoyable. It's the only otome that I find myself able to 100% due to the fact that for most routes (see edit above) there are no Awful endings, just a Sweet/True Love ending and a Bittersweet ending. The writing is...Dated. There is a heavyset woman who is voiced by a male and we as a consumer should laugh because 'haha fat', especially because she finds everyone who isn't fat to be puny. [spoiler] There's also a beauty pageant scene where the MC gets bodyshamed because her chest is more on the smaller side. [/spoiler] But other than that, the writing for the actual routes has been sweet.

I have had to stop running the game in full screen due to the game randomly closing, and my save files (particularly the save file in the second slot down, on the first page for the save files) would randomly get corrupted. My solution for that has been running it windowed and saving more often.

author: {'steamid': '76561198876784770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1544, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 375, 'last_played': 1673385749}
review: Incrível! Alem de imersivo, te possibilita a escolher seu próprio trajeto na historia, por mais que tenha um foco para o publico feminino creio que uma historia reinventada de Oz sempre cai bem, sem fala da arte e trilha sonora de tirar o folego!!! Satoi sempre foi uma inspiração para mim desde de 2016 com relação a arte, estilo e criação de historias ou personagens e só agora estou tendo oportunidade de conhecer melhor e me divertir muito! Ainda não terminei todas as trajetórias mas confesso que me emocionei como se eu estivesse na cena shaushaus (doce ilusão de um amor que nunca vai existir mas aquecem o coração ;u; )

author: {'steamid': '76561198290555291', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1142, 'last_played': 1630560068}
review:
O que mais me frustra em OZMAFIA!! é a falta de um replay das cenas principais. A primeira coisa que todo desenvolvedor de otome devia botar no jogo é a porcaria de um replay, mas OK, não tem, fazer o quê?

Não é um jogo muito feliz. Os finais 'bons' são francamente os piores. Ele poderia ser menos decorativo e psicodélico e ser mais violento, já que o contexto é o conflito entre máfias e as disputas são acirradas, mas não há senso de perigo ou de perda.

Não sei se vale o preço cheio. Prefira aguardar por uma promoção.

author: {'steamid': '76561198848764142', 'num_games_owned': 48, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1555, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 525, 'last_played': 1672468792}
review:
打折的时候大约50块钱入的，感觉是值回票价的。
Oz的剧情是我打过的最因人而异的游戏之一！！！感觉场馆线是争议比较大的线路之一，有的人觉得那条线的HE很女王很对胃口，但是打完这条线我整个人都x冷淡了……
纯爱战士们可以打一下Soh，猫姐姐，白狼，小红帽的几条线，还比较甜，而且没有什么很狗血的地方，不过可能有点无聊就是了。
女主的性格真的很傻大姐，感觉是被卖了还帮人数钱那一挂的。
我个人感觉很那啥的一点是，无论我打出了怎样稀巴烂的结局，迎接我的永远是阳光灿烂的ed，Dare to believe we gonna make it~
音乐和砂糖的cg真的很赞！
总结起来就是，虽然很胃痛，但是如果时间回到过去，我还是会买这一部的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198341141578', 'num_games_owned': 26, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1629909331}
review:

这玩的让我亦喜亦忧一惊一乍一乐一拳头硬的，玩的我很起伏……要我安利吧我可能会还是会想安利，但是不是因为香才安利，而是来和我一起痛苦吧！！！而选择安利（。 OPED真的好好听，音乐好值。+砂糖CG也好赚。
但是因为剧本量大+人物塑造好导致我反复回味……一个让我又爱又恨的作品，岂可修！因为有些线我自己是雷到的。
不过如果只是喜欢画风喜欢人想吃糖的话我觉得都打打纯爱封盘是不错的。喜欢虐想吃刀的就和我一起通关吧x

猫姐姐中途有点雷到我了，我一开始和姬友喊老婆老婆，半路发现她喜欢上了axel我说我失恋了我老婆居然爱上了别人，打到最后发觉原来是友情线，啧。喜欢个路人就算了为啥要喜欢上可攻略角色也是有点放飞自我……虽然他俩还挺合适（？
虽然有人觉得chang线刺激带感但是我不行我太雷了，如果这是分在BE的END我可以，但是HE和NE都是被内啥了我是难以接受的，如果是HE和manboy两人远走高飞，nebe分支现在的两种结局我觉得ok。正统线写这种结局我真的佩服剧本娘……
我真的超级讨厌chang线，加上因为画师也是砂糖让我越看那個大叔越觉得他是皇阿玛，我真的好不喜欢他！！
我只想和manboy远走高飞，aru就当个吉祥物吧x
医生线也是有点背德，也是个大雷。比起让女主和他一起我更希望他能和妻子在一起（。 我并不想插足，我只想看你们幸福.jpg
so本来觉得是个超级小天使，心疼，等打完真相发现这人不能用一个腹黑就能概括的。天使和恶魔并存就是指这样的人吧，我都不知道他在hameln线是以什么样的心情去做饭送饭的，我二周目hameln线的时候真的很无奈。
虽然很想讲hameln但是我怕我泪崩。一周目打的时候就泪崩了，打完真相回来二周目再通一遍哭的比一周目厉害好几倍，真的太痛苦太心疼了。全作最好最善良最温柔的男人被洗脑亲自毁了最好的朋友的人生还伤害了自己的家族，这不完全疯已经很厉害了。稍微疯一点已经很好了……没打真相之前还在想是不是有双重人格，因为别的线他一直像個反派。
然后真相线看了之后hameln厨真的不能发自内心的喜欢soh，虽然他真的是小天使吧，也有苦衷吧，自己的线也挺惨的吧，但是也是个万恶之源啊，hameln也没有幸福啊，比他更惨啊！！！！崩了崩了。至少soh还能在阳光下和fuka一起，那hameln呢？导致我对so真的不能发自内心的喜欢。觉得他可爱，觉得他惨，但是不能喜欢上他，他对hameln造成的伤害真的是无法弥补的。也有剧本娘不给hameln写出一个he的因素，但是可恶，为什么会这样.jpg
加上大团圆也没有给hameln一个好结局。不应该用魔法帮个忙吗，居然还是坐牢，我的天。我不要再体验铁窗爱情了，白石景之一个人就够了（突然乱入CM，因为我是個白石推），我没有想到时隔四年我又推了一个铁窗爱情的角色，我和铁窗有孽缘吧，88。
キリエ也是心疼的不行，就他所有都记得，只有他记得多萝西，我都感觉官配不应该是卡拉米亚而是キリエ了，这完全就是官配吧2333
不过也可能是因为性格，官配一般都是要卡拉米亚那种的。
反正打下来oz真的是又爱又恨。顺便一提，我打到很后面才知道原来安迪是女孩子，天啊我一直以为是个男孩子（邓瑶

author: {'steamid': '76561198178187153', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 768, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 768, 'last_played': 1625067434}
review:
I'm usually pretty forgiving with VN games since I enjoy playing them, but found this game to be somewhat lacking in quality. Different character routes are okay to play through the first time around, but if you're a completionist like me and was to see every ending, this game is far too repetitive to enjoy that. It also really feels like there isn't much of a plot when you're playing, the game feels like it's just dragging on because there's no real progress being made towards any big picture goal.

Making strategic save files will help save you the trouble of going through the whole thing, but ultimately you will have to go back and pick all the opposite choices to get another separate ending. The skip button is also rather annoying to have to turn back on again after reaching new content automatically turns it off (which when playing through a route again, will end up being a few extra lines scattered during each playthrough that you didn't get to see before). 

Don't get me wrong, it's not totally horrible. I did at least find the story and characters somewhat interesting, and there are some unique features that I haven't seen anywhere else. I especially liked the concept that allows you to switch characters after romancing one, but also thought it's a little weird that the character you were dating before doesn't seem to care or be salty about it later on after their confrontation. These alternative endings allow you to see another side of the characters and get entirely separate endings from their main routes. 

If you're going to buy, I'd recommend purchasing on a sale. It's just not quality enough content in my opinion to buy at that full price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077090012', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 3078, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3078, 'last_played': 1628267726}
review:
Con un diseño de personajes absolutamente precioso, fue lo primero que me llamó la atención de Ozmafia!!, una novela visual del género otome que tenía muchas ganas de probar.

Si bien el comienzo es un tanto cliché, chica que sufre amnesia, tiene el encanto de que viajar a una ciudad un tanto especial donde hay personajes salidos directamente de cuentos: Mago de Oz, Caperucita Roja, etc, (bueno, hay un caso en especial que precisamente "de cuento" no es).

Un punto muy fuerte de este otome es que gracias a la gran variedad de personajes hay muchas rutas a escoger y, de cada una de estas, distintos finales, por lo que en duración no se le puede poner queja alguna.

Por contra a este punto favorable, es que he encontrado las historias un tanto superficiales en líneas generales, además de que hay una ruta un tanto... desagradable puede decirse. Eso ha hecho que, si bien he disfrutado de la novela visual, no me haya llenado tanto como en un primer momento parecía ya que creo que podría haberse aprovechado los personajes y sus tramas un poco mejor. 

En definitiva, Ozmafia!! es un otome que disfrutarán todo amante del género con sus virtudes y sus fallos con personajes atractivos y unos diseños absolutamente preciosos.

Como pequeño extra, os dejo mi recomendación personal del orden de rutas que creo que hará disfrutar aún la experiencia:

Caramia>Scarlet>Axel>Brothel>Pashet>Robin Hood>Kyrie>Hamelin>Caesar>Soh

author: {'steamid': '76561198138322835', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2446, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2446, 'last_played': 1626543621}
review:
It always feels a little odd leaving a bad review for a game others seem to enjoy so much… bUt I gUeSs SoMeOnE hAs tO dO iT. And before you come for me upon looking at my hours played, please know that I am a shameless completionist. So despite the annoying pain this game put me through, I finished it from top to bottom.

[u] Bones I’m Throwing Before I Slaughter This Game: (i.e.: What I Actually Liked) [/u]
[b] >An Abundance of Routes! [/b] There are a lot of routes and range of characters to date. 
[b] >Art. [/b] Art is beautiful in this game. Some CGs have odd angles, but overall it's really well done. 
[b] >Lengthy. [/b] Actually, it's TOO lengthy (which I’ll get into below) but it earns its price point for the overall amount of content and time it takes to play. 
[b] >Some Genuinely Funny Bits. [/b] The humor lands relatively well throughout the game. In fact, I may go as far to say, it's the game’s most redeeming quality. I would name some specifics, but I think they would qualify as spoilers. In general, Kyrie is an abundant source of humor in this game. Gretel is also an absolute charm. But everyone has some moments of very funny content. 
[b] >Great Minor Characters. [/b] Perhaps even more interesting than the main characters…
[b] >Creative and Interesting Setting. [/b] The world is very unique and the concept interesting. For those wondering, the characters ARE inspired by The Wizard of Oz, as well as other well known Fairy Tales (and also The Picture of Dorian Gray… which I guess is sort of a fairy tale? Except I wouldn’t read it to a child…)

[u] Just What IS My Problem? (i.e.: What Ruined It For Me)[/u]
[b] >That Godd@am Loading Screen. [/b] Easily the worst thing about this Otome is its godforsaken loading screen. You don't notice how present it is in your first or second playthrough, but after that, it is an utter BLIGHT to this game. It pops up with it's stupid little jingle after 4 lines of dialogue. Constantly and needlessly haunting you to no end. It's BEYOND annoying.
[b] >Tedious. [/b] If The Loading Screen of Death wasn’t enough to make you scream from how it grinds action to a halt, the game in general is slow and repetitive. I can’t figure out what the ultimate story goal of this Otome is. It's certainly not plot heavy. Overall very little happens. It’s not character-development heavy. Most characters are exactly the same in the end as they are in the beginning— with Axel and idk… maaaaybe Pashet and Scarlet being (weak) exceptions of having personal growth. The protagonist certainly doesn’t evolve. My best guess is that the goal was mostly “world building” and the world IS interesting, but what we’re given is spread way too thin across way too many routes. It definitely has bright moments throughout, but by my 4th route, it felt like a slog. I’ll also add that some CGs (and all are needed to get to the Grand Finale) are really difficult to get. I wasted a lot of time doing what I thought was the “obvious direction” to obtain them, only for it not to work. Save yourself the annoyance by following walkthroughs. 
[b] >Nightmare Protagonist. [/b] Lord, where do I even start with this woman…  I’ve played enough Otome games, that I understand the point of making the protagonist dumb and bland. She needs to be naive & curious enough that she falls into foolish situations, and vague enough that people can filter their own personalities into her— thereby relating her to the players and complimenting whatever personality of the lover she is in pursuit of. But listen… there is no one alive…. as dumb as this protagonist. Need an example? This woman is literally so dumb, that one of the characters has to explain the concept of death to her! "BeCaUsE oF hEr AmNeSiA!"-- cry the game developers! Homegirl can remember how to READ, and can remember the meaning of fairly complex vocabulary words, but doesn't remember what happens when someone is "dead"? It’s even more ridiculous when you consider that it is established, within the first five seconds of gameplay, that she is fearful of dying. C'mon. It just makes no sense. And there are routes where she actively gets MORE stupid as the game goes. How?!?! While her absolute stupidity can add to the humor of the game, the real problem it creates is that she ends up being suited to NO ONE (imo, imo). I don’t buy that any of these dudes are, or would be, in love with her. She does nothing— action, thought, or personality wise— to earn their affection. I guess the exceptions could be Axel (who matches her in social ineptitude) or Soh (who matches her in child-like earnestness). But all of these love stories are so unearned and thus feel utterly unsatisfying. I cannot say that any one ending felt fulfilling to me. (In hindsight, Axel’s route probably would have, had I played him early on. But he was like #6 for me, and I was kinda over the grind by then.) I will also add that the game, in the epilogue, tries to explain why is so dumb, but the reason is weak and does not save you from how miserably she behaves in the rest of the game.
[b] >The Edgy "Dark Themes". [/b] I don't mind dark themes in my Otome, but I'd like them to be taken seriously if they're going to happen. And I'd like the game to at least insulate, in one way or another, that they, the game developers, understand that something morally wrong has occurred… that did not happen in this game. It's additionally odd, because characters in some routes very specifically ask for consent from the protagonist to kiss/get-down with her while others straight-up drug her. It’s dealt with very poorly and never addressed after the fact.
[b] >Hetrosexual as Hell. [/b] Whatever excuse you have, I don’t care about it. NOT GAY ENOUGH FOR ME, FAM. The game made me believe I could end up with Pashet, but I could not. Also, I wanted to be with Gretel. And I could not. I am bitter about it.
[b] >Not-So-Grand Finale. [/b] I sure went through hell and high water and 40 hours of gameplay just to desperately get to the grand finale annnnddddd I was disappointed. Not so much in the content of it, but it's VERY short. Like 5 minutes. The Epilogue is longer than the Grand Finale. 


Overall, did I utterly hate the game and regret playing it? ...To a point, YEAH! I definitely regret some of it. I would have been far happier if I played a single route for each character, did the epilogue, and then just looked up the grand finale ending elsewhere. It definitely wasn’t worth the time crunch of getting every ending and seeing every itty-bitty cut scene. It took way too long, and ultimately, while some of the characters are enjoyable— no one earned my overall affection. If you asked who my favorite dateable character was, it would only elicit a noncommittal shrug. My ultimate suggestion is that if the game is on sale, you have an abundance of time to burn, and you’re not new to Otome games (therefore not letting this define what you think of the genre)...Then maybe try it out. 

But that’s a lot of ‘ifs’. 

There are better ones out there, folks.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002539704', 'num_games_owned': 257, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1625114833}
review:
I can forgive a lot of writing faults if the game as a whole is still well presented. Normally. The writing here is jus too insubstantial for a visual NOVEL. A scene will start and then fade to black suddenly so it can get on with the next one. Like a fight broke out and it faded to black before going to the Choose Who You Wanna Hang With selection. It didn't even tell me how the fight ended! I feel like too many scenes are just glimpses of the story and while I don't mind sometimes being left to imagine things, this just isn't a good application of that.

The game spends minimal time setting up the world and your character's new place in it. The premise of fairytale mafia families was interesting but once it's set up it's mostly slice of life stuff now, with rare mafia fighting just to spice up the romance with danger moments. Maybe some routes make better use of it but given the refund window is short I didn't want to find out.

I got it on sale and even that price was too high for the quality of writing you get out of it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198425509530', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2597, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2597, 'last_played': 1622659113}
review:
OZMAFIA!! is an otome game, one of the first I have played instead of watched. This game fully immersed me in it's story despite it's slow start. It not only has many routes and endings, but many characters you can get to know, love and hate. I will admit, the game does have a few holes in it's story line, though I believe the amount of emotion you will feel from playing this game to its entirety will cause you to overlook the mistakes.

The characters for one can be either extremely loveable or extremely hateable. However you feel about them, they are almost guaranteed to make you laugh, cry and most definitely want to pull your hair out at times. Some characters definitely deserved more recognition than they got, (Scarlet, Pashet, Soh, Manboy). I felt like their routes could have been more plentiful story-wise. Soh's route simply doesn't make sense either until you reach the epilogue, which makes me a bit uneasy for those who only want to try one or two routes of their favorite characters. Though overall, the characters are enjoyable and serve their purpose in the game.

The art is flawless, Satoi never fails to disappoint. My only complaint is that some of the character designs highly remind me of those from Diabolik Lovers, another game Satoi did character designs and art for. Even some of their personalities overlap, but I digress. The art is absolutely stunning and captivating, if you come for the art, you won't be disappointed.

With over 20 endings including 10 characters most people will learn to fall in love with, 87 CGs of very high quality art that is to die for, I would say this is worth the money spent on the game, just make sure you get it while on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198974514841', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 375, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 210, 'last_played': 1641829994}
review:
之前汉化盗版全CG收藏，回来买了英文版和switch版正在重新过一遍。
温暖日常，全都是温暖日常，大部分剧情类似于童话世界过家家，不过这个正好治愈了我这寒窗三年高中毕业老阿姨的心，于是考完正好来评测一下。毕竟这个游戏没有badend，trueend再加上groundend对我来说还蛮可以接受的。喜欢主线Caramia和Kyrie还有Oscar Wilde的Queen线，其他角色除Scarlet和Axel都略显单薄。主要是女主Fuka太傻白甜这一点我不是很能接受，但是如果把她当女儿看不但没有违和感还觉得挺治愈的。
就价格来讲普通打折五十块钱购入不算亏。单靠剧情来说并不算出彩。就世界观来说也并不无聊，很多细节可以延伸。总的来说算是一个优缺点都十分明显的普通乙游。期待续作reflection。

author: {'steamid': '76561198052506484', 'num_games_owned': 112, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 987, 'last_played': 1629101294}
review:
I'm keeping this game just to see how far it will go, but I certainly don't recommend it.
Reasons:

- Totally dumb MC, no personality at all except being a naive girl, boring AF;
- Shallow characters and no compelling love interest so far. A lot of very, very toxic options from the start or later on (get close to the man who tries to kill you at least three times? or to the sadistic mafioso? or the misterious and crazy dude who you'll never fully comprehend? or the deranged widowed doctor? and let's not talk about the Brothel storyline )
- There's no romance, really. It's not cute, neither sexy, just silly, rushed and/or plain weird "love" stories where people professes some kind of twisted love to each other.
- The game twists innocent plots and characters with sudden heavy content, from sexual exploits and BDSM, to brutal murders and such, it's a mind fuck. Neither here nor there, none are really enjoyable.
- I haven't played the main routes yet, maube they are better? But one is a sadistic and mean character, the other is a stereotypical brooding man and the third one may be interesting, but who knows.

That being said, don't waste your money. If you want a wholesome romantic visual novel experience, go play Our Life, it's free and beautiful.

author: {'steamid': '76561198808404577', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1620178618}
review: I thought this otome game has a potential then bought it. But it wasn't turn out like what I expect. I played almost two hours but i didn't even do something except choose a name for my character. Beginning was very very long I think it would make you sleepy like me too. This amount of time I learned loads of details that didn't make the story interesting. Just some usual things that very much boring. If we put this aside, has a very good design. But not much animated scenes for characters. Also has good voice synchronization and nice backplane. But still the storytelling very problematic for me so I didn't like it when I played.

author: {'steamid': '76561198444320824', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3430, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1108, 'last_played': 1624242592}
review: The main character girl doesn't have the best personality or make the best sound decisions. Sometimes playing just one route can seem kinda dull, but the more routes you play the more the stories unfold and the more fun little bits of information you get. Sometimes the character develops interestingly, other times less so. It does have its nice own little world that is fun to learn about, and it always leaves you with unanswered questions.

author: {'steamid': '76561198868756944', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 563, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 563, 'last_played': 1619374522}
review:
I tried to persevere through this as it was expensive, but the story is terrible and poorly written and I can't find the motivation to finish it. Possibly the worst Otome game I've played. There is no drive to the story, the MC is beyond dumb to the point of being annoying and the romance makes no sense. 
I only completed Caramia's route and two of his love triangle endings, before it got too boring. The love triangles were terrible, she literally jumps within 5 minutes after declaring love with one dude and is suddenly in love with the next dude, and that dude is totally okay with having sloppy seconds.
I read plenty of reviews online before I purchased this, and they were pretty positive, but I'm sorry, I personally can't see anything good about this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198380132245', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 7432, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2688, 'last_played': 1659109603}

author: {'steamid': '76561198796370344', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3380, 'last_played': 1618776132}
review:
This was such a whirlwind of a game but like in the best way. Of course I really enjoyed the romantic routes [spoiler](there should have been some better endings for scarlet, soh - yes i forgive him- and manboy/alfani, oh my god dont get me started on how much i hated what manboy had to go through)[/spoiler] i also just really liked piecing the over arching  plot together based on the info given in the routes.

After playing through for yourself one time i recommend using a guide because oh my god there are so many endings and routes this game has so much replay value- even after you finish some routes you get extra scenes based off of them in your next playthrough.

Of course the art is beautiful like stunning although some CGs were much better than others. The voiced voicelines were also really good- even though they were in another language they really captured the emotions and personalities of the characters. 

I'm very very tired and don't have much else to write but just honestly? This otome was amazing i definitely recommend it to anyone who is a fan of the genre- although it is very dark so if you're not into that don't be fooled by the fairytale aesthetic lmao

Favourite route: Soh [spoiler]almost being able to live out my cottagecore fantasies[/spoiler]
Least favourite route: Robin Hood [spoiler]please he's so creepy and such a prick but i did really feel touched by the moment his wife woke up and put him at ease[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198171898093', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 480, 'last_played': 1643788064}
review:
ตอนเเรกสนใจเพราะดีไซน์ตัวละคร เลยกดซื้อมา หลังจากได้เล่นตอนเเรกก็โอเครนะ เล่นได้เรื่อยๆ จนกลางๆเรื่องรู้สึกเนือยตอนเล่นมากๆ นี่ก็ฝืนใจพยายามเล่น 
สรุปเเล้ว เล่นเเล้วง่วงสุดด เนื้อเรื่องไม่มีอะไรน่าตื่นเต้นเท่าเกมจีบหนุ่มที่เคยเล่นๆมา คือปกติเล่นติดต่อกันได้ 3-4 ชม.
เเต่เกมนี้พักทุก ครึ่งชม.
***หงุดหงิดมากที่สุดเลยคือ รูทAxel(ความคิดเห็นส่วนตัว) ช่วง Vs. กับอีกตัวละครที่มีใจให้นางเอกเหมือนกัน คือปวดตับเเทนนางเอก - - ***
++เเนะนำให้(ฝืน)เล่นจนถึงสัปดาห์ท้ายๆ จะสนุกขึ้นมาหน่อย++
**เเนะนำเกมนี้เพราะ Transfer Ending อันนี้เล่นเเล้วชอบจริง โครตดีย์ -.,- **

author: {'steamid': '76561198869294886', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2850, 'last_played': 1707844254}
review:
일러만 보고 5년동안 짝사랑 해온 게임... 언어의 장벽 때문에 5년전엔 못했었지만 지금은 일본어를 들을수있어서 순조롭게 플레이 할수 있었다.. 영어도 단어만 잘 안다면 그닥 어려운편은 아니여서 다행이었다..
아.. 진짜 내가 진짜 열심히 플레이 해서 바친시간 아깝지 않았던것같다 평소 세계관이나 스토리가 넓은걸 선호해서인지 마지막 피날레엔딩을 볼때는 캐릭터를 못떠나보내서 눈물이 났다 진짜
산걸 후회하지도 않았고 오히려 떠나보내기 어렵다 이게 5년 짝사랑의 힘이냐.., 
플탐이 길긴하다... 3일동안 꾸준히 공략집 보고 하면 할만하다... 하지만 길어서 더 정이 생기는듯.. 나 아직도 못보내... 너무 행복한 47시간이었던것같다... 물론 개별루트에서 빡치는것도 있었고... 여주가 이해안가는 부분도 있었지만 모르겠다 나중가면 다 정들어버렸다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083232424', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 2851, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2846, 'last_played': 1636564420}
review:
Вот уж, действительно. Эту игру или любят или нет. Составлять по ней отзыв отдельное мучительное удовольствие. Арты, музыка, озвучка - замечательные.

Для меня игра крутилась вокруг одного персонажа - вокруг токсичного, но харизматичного му*ака. Его поведение, вполне, было объяснимо для меня, кто ж себя-то не поймет. Эпилог и финал припечатали к креслу, под этим впечатлением и пишу. Не ошибся в выборе фаворита, вот, что я понял.

Игра раскрывает себя не с одной концовки, если вам тяжело - дропайте, это не ваша игра, нечего грызть этот кактус, милые мышата. Оставшихся же ждет куча концовок, без этого никак. От абсурда некоторых, я смеялся, как гиена. От других пробивал лицо фейспалмом. Третьи - подпалили седалище. Четвертые - ввели в отчаянное положение, похрустывает на зубах просто великолепно. Основные руты вызвали кучу эмоций за раз, не то, чтобы особо положительных. Решайте сами для себя "правильные" концовки, где не так жуется стекло, именно так я и сделал - игра заиграла другими красками.

Отдельно хочется сказать о главной героине. Терпите. Ее тупость объясняется в конце. Вам от этого легче не будет, но, видимо, чем круче прописано окружение, тем тупее мейн.

Отзыв с сюжетными спойлерами к игре для храбрых:

[spoiler] Жесткие спойлеры начинаются 3...2...1...
Маленькая девочка телом, но уже довольно взрослая внутри, Дороти после своего великого путешествия в страну Оз, о котором, вы все, наверняка, так или иначе знаете, стала ведьмой, начиталась книжек и создала содом и гоморру для своих друзяшек по странствию. Только не учла, что сидеть в башне одной скучно, поэтому решила присоединиться к тусовке внизу, не предусмотрев некоторые вещи. Применять на себя магию - большое ата-та, поэтому наше золотко поделила себя на части, одна из которых (в виде ее души) попала туда, куда и задумывалось, с одним огромнейшим "но" - стала нулевой версией Пугала в терминальной стадии. Тупее пробки, душа исследует все вокруг и познает мир: мутит с Оз-никами, теряет их важные вещи, устраивает тройничок с пристом, общается с кошкодевочками и другим населением городка. Все это творится под малокомментируемое офигевание того, кто помнит Дороти с детских времен. В перерывах между действиями за тупой душой бегает магия (еще одна часть Дороти) и хочет ее сожрать, и это отдельный повод для гэга. [/spoiler]

Игра прекрасна в своей "абсурдности". ːkyrieː
10 кар-карычей из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045193679', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 305, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 270, 'last_played': 1615896816}
review:
Симулятор свиданий со сказочными [strike]дoлбoёбами[/strike] персонажами.

Тут есть:
* Ричард Львиное Сердце (Лев)
* Высокомерный мyдaк (Пугало)
* Занудное бревно (Железный дровосек)
* Воинственное хамло (Большой и страшный [strike]серый[/strike] белый волк)
* Винишко-кун (Робин Гуд)
* Потенциальная жертва педобира (Мальчик Красная Шапочка)
* Мальчик божий одуванчик
* Поехавший пират
* Кошкодевочка

ГГ - классическая наивная дурочка.

+ Нарисовано красиво
+ Написано хорошо, словесного поноса почти нет.

+/- Если сильно заморочиться с любовными многоугольниками, можно увидеть пару астеничных мужских телес. Хотя смотреть там не на что.

- Сюжет. Он как рваная тряпка, состоящая из slice of life и каких-то тупых махачей "за раён".
- Оптимизация. Спустя час начинает жесточайше тормозить, хотя игра древнейшая и должна идти даже на кухонных весах, не говоря уж о современных компьютерах.

Целевая аудитория: девочки 14-18 лет.

Стоит ли своих денег? Нет. К покупке только со щедрой скидкой.

Так как мир Стима исключительно черно-белый, то пусть будет положительная оценка, а так - нейтральная.

author: {'steamid': '76561198231006800', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 3094, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2747, 'last_played': 1671688676}
review:
ซื้อมาก็ปีกว่าๆล่ะ เล่นไม่จบรูททุกคนสักที ขอรีวิวเลยนะกัน

ซื้อมาเพราะชอบที่ภาพสวยกับดีไซต์ตัวละครที่อ้างอิงพวกตัวละครในนิทาน แต่คนที่ชอบที่สุดในเกมดันเป็นซีซาร์ไม่ใช่ "สามหนุ่มตัวละครหลัก" ของเนื้อเรื่องแล้วนอกจากหนุ่มๆสามคนที่เป็นตัวหลัก รูทคนอื่นสั้นมากกกบางคนเล่นไม่ถึงชม.จบได้เลย ผิดหวังนิดๆ ที่หลายคนทำคาแลคเตอร์มาได้ถูกใจและดึงดูดแต่กับใช้ได้ไม่คุ้มสะเลย เนื้อเรื่องส่วนตัวค่อนข้างน่าเบื่อเป็นเหตุผลนึงที่ทำให้ดองเกมนี้เล่นไม่จบสักที ส่วนเรื่องเสียงพากษ์มีแค่ตอนแรกๆและบางฉาก ถ้าซื้อตอนลดราคาคิดว่าคุ้มอยู่ที่จะซื้อมาเล่นแต่ราคาเต็มไม่แนะนำค่ะ เทียบกับอีกเกมในสตีมที่ราคาเท่ากัน แถมเสียงพากษ์ฟูลเนื้อเรื่องสนุกเข้มข้นแล้วเกมนี้ต้องบอกว่าไม่ถึงครึ่งของเกมนั้นเลย

author: {'steamid': '76561198321461321', 'num_games_owned': 509, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1184, 'last_played': 1615327620}
review:
So this game has taken me two years to finish because I nope out after playing  a certain ending of a route. It took a while to come back to this game because I was worried that all the routes would be like the first route I read. After talking to some people who had played the game there are better routes and I just started the game with one of the worst routes. 

I first played this game with a friend who streamed the game over discord and we played the common route and the good ending for the brothel route-my friend wanted to date Manboy because his name was funny. So my hours played are not reflective of what I actually play because I skip through the parts that we read together and did the ending we did together quickly.

I love the common route of the game where you get to meet all of the different characters and was great the first time you read. But, the common route got tedious the more you had to play it because there are just so many routes and you need to do the common route for almost every route except  the triangle route if you save at the right point. 

So the order I played this game was:
Brothel>Caramia>Kyrie>Axel>Hamelin>Pashet>Scarlet>Robin Hood>Soh> Caesar 
I really don’t recommend playing the Brothel route first and if I could go back I would play the Brothel route between Hamelin and Pashet’s route as I think there are elements of Hamelin’s route that link into the Brothel route and Pashet’s route is good mind bleach after a certain brothel route ending. 

The brothel was the first route I play and I really don’t recommend it as a route to start the game with. You have elements of BDSM, drug use and sex positivity. You get one satisfying ending which I think would have had a better impact if I played this route later in the game and another ending that made me nope out of the game. 

Caramia’s route was the first route I played coming back to the game after not playing it a while and if definitely a route that if you want to play the game that you should start since he is the don of the Ozmafia. His route was wild and I loved it and this route actually made me want to continue playing this game. 

Kyrie’s route was not one of my favourites and some of that has to do with me not like his character because he appeared in the brothel route. His route changed my mind on hating him to feel indifference towards him and the route was just as wild as Caramia’s route so I was happy to continue reading it. However, there were a few points where I wanted to stop reading for the same reasons I didn’t like his route so much, but with some encouragement from other otome fans I continued reading his route. 

Axel’s route is my favourite route out of the three OZ boys. I think he’s very much a tsundere character which I love but he also has elements of a kuudere- so if you like characters of either of those tropes then you might love his route. I adore his route so much and seeing his blushing sprite was so cute.

The transfer route were okay- I like more than other and also one of the transfer route is glitched for some reason which is Kyrie prue love Vs Axel. These routes were something different that I haven’t seen in otome games before. I felt they were very meh as the transfer endings were very similar and didn’t really add much to the story- though it did give me the satisfaction that I could leave Kyrie mid route for Axel. 

Hamelin’s route was interesting so he is a good example of yagire trope. His route links into the three oz boys routes and gives you a different perspective on things that you saw in the previous routes- make sure to have tissues nearby because both of his endings might make you cry. 

Pashet’s route I went in hoping for a female love interest because me bi/pan heart really wants to romance at least one female character, but sadly it is just a platonic/friendship route. I didn’t actually mind this route once I played one ending as other endings were cute and I love that you get to play matchmaking and help a female friend find love instead of you finding love. 10/10 would recommend this route as mind bleach to play after any route that is too much. 

Scarlet’s route exceeded my expectations, I went in thinking awww he’s so cute and adorable and came out of it shipping the MC with him and thinking he is the best guy for her out of the guys so far. His route made me see the Oz boys in a different light which I enjoyed- I love it when otome games make you start to see different characters differently.

Robin hood’s route was the second route that got me to nope out from this game- it was only for a few days this time as one of my friend kept reminding me I needed to do caesar’s route. Robin Hood’s route was just a no but it did answer some questions from Hamelin’s route. Just be prepared that this is another route where there are some heavy subject matter involving drugs and that Robin Hood is a worse version of Mr. Freeze. 

Soh’s route I originally was going to play this route last but was talked out of it by some friends and I was glad I did because the overall route is great but both endings are just pain and left me with more questions about the world that the game was set in. Soh is a cute character but don’t leave him for last- he makes a good penultimate route. 

Caesar’s route was a great final route and out of all the character routes that you can play his route feels like the cannon route. I love him so much in the story and he can so tsun at some points and caring at other points in his route. He is best boi of this game for me (closely followed by Axel). 

The Great final and Epilogue broke me because characters I loved turned out to bad and characters that I hated turned out to be damaged. This ending messed with my head a lot but I did enjoy reading it and I really didn’t see some of the things coming- a lot of the time I’m quite good at predicting what might happen but this ending I couldn’t. 

Overall, I really enjoyed this game but I do think you should do some of the routes in a specific order (and don’t start with the brothel route).

author: {'steamid': '76561198441632851', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1479, 'last_played': 1631232160}
review:
I'm not even kidding, the only reason I bought this game, was because the art kept reminding me of Diabolik Lovers, and you cannot deny the similarity between the heroines, Yui and F-u-k-a (((I ain't playing, Steam is literally censoring F-u-k-a's name, so I have to spelt it out dhdhbwjdfbjh))

Comparing Ozmafia to other otome, I find the storyline pretty interesting, but at times it can be quite anti-climatic, and cause me to zone out :D I'll admit that I found it interesting that the creator took inspiration from one of my favourite stories, The Wizard of Oz, and its pretty obvious. The intermission showcases the original cast of the story, and the three main love interests are tailored after the Lion, Scarecrow and Tin Man ((I secretly wish that at the end of each route they had a scene of the heroine saying "there's no place like home")), that would be *chefs kiss* AHEM. Ok so, I'll strictly discuss the main routes (haven't done any side routes). I find Caramia to be charming, he's a typical paternal love interest, shows affection easily, and is fairly transparent. Uhm Kyrie (-.-) he's my least favourite, he's a tsundere, but its to the the extent that he's incredibly obnoxious and inconsiderate. The man blatantly tells the heroine he loves seeing her suffer, and always belittles Caramia and Axel. His route was painful. So far, Axel has been my favourite, he's the most complex, as he represents the Tin Man. Axel has the ability to be sympathetic, and makes himself really vulnerable around the heroine, always trying his best to comfort and consult her. Yet, he's also the physically strongest member of the familgia, and he's quite skilled in combat. I find it pretty cute that he waves around his shotgun like an axe, and his sprites are the most breathtaking.  

Hahaha, I will continue this review once I play Hamelin, and Caesar's route, because they look very pretty lol. Okie peace

author: {'steamid': '76561198177784299', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 891, 'last_played': 1622741031}
review:
Hasta el punto que he llegado (y habiendo completado 4 rutas) tengo cosas que decir:

➱ El juego tiene algunos problemas técnicos y a veces se queda colgado. Vas a tener que ser una maniática/o del guardado porque igual pierdes la partida. Además, no puedes hacer screenshots.

➱ En este otome sustituyen muchísimos CGs por texto. Es decir, en muchas situaciones describen lo que pasa en lugar de poner alguna imagen. Esto hace que pierda ambientación, porque pasa en prácticamente todas las rutas y los CGs los han dejado mas bien para los finales de la ruta y demás.

➱ Al menos el 70-80% de la ruta de los 3 bachelors de Oz es casi lo mismo. (Lo bueno es que cuando te has pasado una ruta de esas la primera vez y te la re-juegas, añaden escenas extras que te hacen pensar "ahhhh, por eso era...").

➱ El juego sólo tiene voces en un 70%, eso quiere decir que igual de un momento a otro los personajes dejan de hablar (voz) y vuelven a hablar a los 10 minutos.

➱ La estructuración de la historia es... A ver, sí hay cosas que están relacionadas entre sí, pero otras son muy confusas, a veces los bachelors te sueltan una bomba (o sea, te dicen algo potente o que te deja alucinando) y ves que la escena se corta ahí y amaneces en otro día, eso es un poco extraño, porque te da a entender que "por detrás" los personajes han tenido más interacciones pero tú nunca las ves y la MC tampoco lo sabe.

➱ Como he dicho por ahora he hecho 4 rutas y sin hacer spoiler, 2 de esas 4 me han parecido un poco "wtf", pero wtf por parte de la MC y por parte del propio bachelor, cosas como "te conozco de hace dos días, vámonos del pueblo juntos porque te amo" y la MC en plan claro, sí, por qué no. Amiga, date cuenta. Esas cosas hacen sentir que la ruta no tiene ni pies ni cabeza y ni siquiera parece una "ruta" en sí.

Pero por otro lado sí lo recomiendo porque, como todo, es una historia que te puede gustar, es bonita, hay personajes de cuento de hadas como Pedro, Caperucita Roja, Heidi, etc., con los que la verdad te echas unas muy buenas risas, y te puede distraer un poco del día a día que para eso está.

(Eso sí, yo lo compré de rebajas y sigo pensando que si lo compras, debería ser de rebajas por los problemas técnicos, lo malas que son algunas rutas y el poco contenido visual que tiene).

author: {'steamid': '76561199065935234', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3608, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3600, 'last_played': 1634269685}
review:
I probably should've done a review as soon as I finished  but I'll try my best to remember;-;
Ozmafia was my very first otome game and while it's not perfect, I did enjoy it overall. The OP and ED song slaps, I listen to it regularly. At first I was skeptical on whether I should buy it or not since it is pricey and a lot of people criticized it, but I'm glad I did buy it in the end. I fell in love with all the characters (except a few:| you know who you are >:|), the main and side. 
Some things I would say were a bit annoying was the cutting scene or whatever you call it with that cursed jingle, I wanted to scream every time it popped up lol. It was also a bit time consuming having to skip everything in the common route since it was a bit longer than others but thank goodness for that skip button, I worshiped it every time TT I enjoyed the extra scenes you can encounter on your second play, but oh dear was it annoying when I skipped it but had to stop at the perfect time so I could read those extra scenes lol TT It did make it worthwhile to go through it again though so I guess it was a smart move? The CG's and character design were amazing of course, sooo beautiful, you can never go wrong with Satoi. The art, the aaaaaart. The romance was good but not the best. We got a lot of cute scenes but I didn't really think it was written as well as it could have been. Sometimes the romance felt a bit forced I guess? It was still enjoyable though.

For the characters individually:
Fu ka: I liked Fu ka. Was she the best heroine ever? No. Was she strong and very expressive? No, but we can't forget that she had amnesia this whole time. She didn't know who she was, nor where she came from. I wouldn't expect her to be this great heroine. She certainly had her very irritating moments [spoiler]Not a huuuuge fan of the NTR but I guess it was tolerable? Idk:|[/spoiler] but well she was an ok heroine.
Caramia: Caramia was cute and I enjoyed his story. He wasn't really that memorable for me bc well, he was cute and kind and that was basically it lol. He was your typical perfect good boy I guess? Not that it means he didn't have anything else to show, just that his personality was pretty basic. 
Kyrie: Oh dear. Where do I start lol. Kyrie was, again, the mean flirty character that always teases the MC and stuff. I liked his character on the other routes where we can go to him but I didn't enjoy his own route thaaat much. I still liked him, though he did get me quite annoyed at times. I might've punched my screen a few times while playing his route but it's tolerable? [spoiler]Didn't really like the fact that he technically never even loved Fu ka lol? He pretty much just liked Dorothy the whole time and we were more of a replacement since he couldn't have Dorothy. The route shows he loves us but I felt like it was kinda forced lol. Not my favorite[/spoiler]
Axel: MY BABY. I LOVE HIM SO MUCH. MUST PROTECT. As you can tell, I loved loved loooooved Axel's route. I guess it's because I love making the serious and stern ML's fall in love with the heroine, and him blushing was the cutest thing ever like aaaaaaaaaaaaa. Some parts in his route did make me quite irritated, you can guess which ones lol, but thankfully it didn't drag on for too long.
Pashet: :( Just :( We need a route for her, and not a friendship route >:| Maybe that's just me, but I really wish we could've had something more with Pashet, but I'll take what I got since I love her oh so much TT Her CG's were sooo cute, I love her.
Scarlet: Again :(. I was kinda disappointed with Scarlet's route, I LOOOOVED his character so much and I thought his back story was very interesting to read about, but I just felt like more could've been done yknow? I wish we could've gotten more lovey dovey scenes, and [spoiler]WE DIDN'T GET A KISS SCENE LIKE WHY.WHY.WHY.WHY[/spoiler] Ahem, yeah I loved Scarlet but I wish we got more with him :( [spoiler]His second ending was just:( so bittersweet, I'm going to imagine we ended up getting together and having cute babies:( Also Fu ka was so irritating in his route like girl, stop making my baby suffer>:|[/spoiler]
Robin Hood: :) [spoiler]I HATED HIM. He was the one I was most excited to play and I now hate him with a passion. End of story. Go marry your dead wife and leave Fu ka alone. Fu ka, get some brain cells and stop pinning over some dude who doesn't even like you and just thinks of you as a replacement. Kyrie 2.0. It was a PAIN to get through his route, I'll never replay it.[/spoiler]
Hamelin~: My baby, my ball of cuteness, my little munchkin, I love you <3. Hamelin sadly didn't really have a proper route, but he was one of my top ML's. I'd pay just to have a proper route for him:( I love him. H deserves better.
Soh: :) [spoiler]When I first played his route, I LOVED HIM. I cried in his route, his route was like one of the only ones that made me cry. Then we play the grand finale and :| Go throw yourself in a hole.[/spoiler]
Caesar: I enjoyed Caesar's route and him blushing was so so cuteTT Kinda wish we got more out of his route but oh well, I'll take what I got I guess:( He's also my baby<3
Brothel: Oh boy, here we go:) Uhhhh, yeah. I didn't highly enjoy this one. I'm used to dark things so this wasn't a lot to take in, but I didn't like how some things that were done to Fu ka were handled:|? This could be your guilty pleasure I guess? [spoiler]Getting to rename Dorian was amazing though, I was having a field day with that lolololol I liked dominant Fu ka but idk. Not the best route.[/spoiler]

So yeah, if you don't buy this game then well you're not going to miss out on like a masterpiece, but I think it's a nice game with some good points :) Honestly I'd say it's worth playing just to get to the Grand Finale, that was a nice ending. I'd say buy the game when it's on sale, but if you wanna buy it with the full price then go for it my dude. That's what I did, though I kinda wish I would've waited for a sale lol TT (also had to space out fu ka's name cus it censors it?)

author: {'steamid': '76561199043101404', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2155, 'last_played': 1612358862}
review: To be honest, I wasn't sure what to expect when I purchased this game. The story sounded interesting and right up my alley, I hesitated initially because of the price. However, after reading the other reviews I decided to take the plunge. Was it worth it? I'm not entirely sure. I wish the character routes were a bit more exciting. There really isn't all that much action in the grand scheme of things, at least I don't think so. There are so many characters in this game, but you only have the choice of 10 routes. Whilst that is more than a lot of otome games, there are still many that would have been fun to explore. Also, the repetition drove me slightly mad, even with all the saving and the skipping.- there really isn't all that much variation. I would say the route which deviates the most from the others is the Brothel route- it is kind of brutal. The Brothel route is, I would say, unique in that it is unlike the typical otome dynamic and I did appreciate that, even more so because I didn't expect it. On the up side. I really liked Pashet's route, I thought the friendship between the MC and Pashet was sweet. I also really liked Caesar's route but felt there were some plot holes with his relation to the story; though his origins are revealed in the Epilogue, it does not really explain why he was obsessed with killing the MC upon meeting her even though his apparent hatred of her contributes to much of the story. Scarlet's route was lovely too, as was Soh's though his was bittersweet. I enjoyed Robin Hood's route, though it is a bit weird. Axel's is one of the more romantic routes and I really liked his character. I enjoyed Hamelin's route as well but I do wish it was longer- there is so much that could have been explored with him to make a fully developed route but he has only like 3 cgs. Likewise, the Brothel route, despite it's dark themes, has only maybe 6 cgs and little character development. The Brothel route has basically no romanceable characters- you don't get to select Manboy/Dorian/Alfani as individual routes which I found disappointing. Furthermore, the story I felt was a bit messy- because of the constant back and forth, everything felt jumbled. Whilst the Epilogue does answer some questions, I felt it could have been fleshed out a bit more. Even after playing all the character routes, you don't get any answers until the Epilogue. Personally, I think it would have been better to have the character routes hold a few more revelations and the Epilogue should have tied everything together, along with the Grand Finale. My last note is that the MC really annoyed me because she was useless, though you could argue her amnesia had something to do with that it is only a small part- she did nothing to help herself and very little to help anyone else. However, in spite of my issues with the game, I did enjoy it for the most part. I liked the original concept, the humour, the art work is lovely and the game offers a lot of content. And though I felt at times the Epilogue and Grand Finale was a bit anit-climatic, overall it was the part of the story that had the biggest emotional impact. Anyone who likes otome/VN games will certainly like this too.

review: It is a very pretty game but was very basic and predictable in storyline. Personally I enjoyed this game, but I do not believe it is worth its full price. I managed to get it at 50% and very glad I did. I would be truly upset if I had payed over 30$ for this game. I do still love it and do recommend it if you can purchase it at a discounted price. Please do not buy this at full price, it is very gorgeous and has wonderful voice acting but storywise and character wise it is not worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198392953602', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3912, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3558, 'last_played': 1705252946}
review:
[h1]An underrated romcom-action otome game that has something for everyone's palette.[/h1]
If you want romance, friendship, comedy, tragedy, angst, love triangles, something a little more mature, you'll be able to find them all here. 
The MC has her own personality which can simply be described as that of a child. It can be both endearing and frustrating, but if you acknowledge that as a fact, then you'll be able to finish the game without any problems.
There will be a lot of repetition and scenes that fade to black sooner than you think, but I implore you to endure it. It'll be worth it in the end.


[b]My tips on how to enjoy the game more: [/b]
1. Before you start, check the settings. Put the skip feature on "Read", adjust your volume and etc. When you finish your first route, the CG gallery will be added to the Title Screen.

2. Always create a save file for the day after the Meteor Shower Gathering Festival. The story usually branches from there. Some routes have love triangles, [spoiler] (namely those from Oz. Each boy has 4 endings each: 2 from their pure love, and another 2 for their transfer ending. The color red will show you which one has higher favorability) [/spoiler], create a save file when the choices begin to imply it so you can go back to it later. You'll need to finish all the routes (which is 20+ based on the game description) to be able to unlock the epilogue and grand finale. I recommend you complete your CG Gallery until only a handful are left before seeing the end. 

3. My recommended route order: Caramia, Axel, Pashet, Kyrie, Robin Hood, Scarlet, *Caramia-Transfer , Manboy, *Axel-Transfer, Caesar, *Kyrie-Transfer, Hamelin, Soh, (ending 2 for last).
* = love triangle ending, not the pure love ending


You can start with anyone you like, or who you think the MC will like [strike](if you think she'll like everybody, you're not wrong, but please don't do that for your first route)[/strike], and just work your way with this:

-Scarlet and Robin Hood should come first before Hamelin's route
-Keep Soh, Hamelin, and Ceasar's route for last. Their routes involve a lot of the other characters. 
-Manboy's route is quite stifling. You're free to skip though things you don't like, but you'll have to finish this route either way to complete your CG Gallery and access the epilogue. Keep his route somewhere in the middle.

review:
This game is probably one of the best otome games I've played so far and it's also available on steam (If you can't tell already). The cgs are amazing in this one. I can confirm that this one has your usual romance and comedy in it, but it's also pretty dark in some parts of the plot. This one also features love triangles (spoilers spoilers heheheh).

If you're wondering whether this game is actually worth it, I'd answer yes. However, the price of these otome games can often go out of hand.

author: {'steamid': '76561199000856516', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1860, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1795, 'last_played': 1610175525}
review: Probably one of my most favorite visual novels so far. The story definitely isn't for everyone, and it's not the deepest or most interesting, but it's still very enjoyable to say the least. The artwork, the humor, the gameplay, characters, and the voiceover are all amazing. Ozmafia really does not get the attention it deserves. If you really enjoy visual novels, hot guys, or even pretty ladies (Ozmafia serves those too, thankfully) and something a little more laid back with a side of action and some mystery, I'd heavily recommend this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198103499770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 328, 'last_played': 1608966929}
review: What an absolutely boring and tedious games. I have played a GOOD amount of otome games and this is one of the least interesting games I have ever played. I regret even buying this despite it being on sale. The story is nonexistent and the writing in general is just bad. The characters lack any real personality and have no development whatsoever. The choices you get to make are completely meaningless. MC is dumb as rocks, which sure is common in otome but wow I mean she is seriously stupid and not just because of the amnesia. I will continue playing and hope for any improvement but it is already painful for me just to start the game up. So much for being a completionist, this game will make you want to pull your hair out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198816452188', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1437, 'last_played': 1544848099}
review:
So. Much. Content!!
Beautiful game with wonderful voice acting, artwork, music and stories...stories range to more mature subject matter including assault/drug use/etc so be warned that some routes are not "light and fluffy".
After following guides, I was only able to get about 1 ending for available character after 24 hours of game play, and I'm a fast reader, so there's a TON of content to get through....overall great game for the price!
I have definitely cried (happy and sad) over this game too, so there's something to be said for the writing having a great range :)

Highly recommend for otomoe lovers!

author: {'steamid': '76561198194276130', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 3314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2274, 'last_played': 1663063105}
review:
[h1]A good otome game that might not be for everyone.[/h1]

Well, before I get into anything (especially the criticism) let me say that this was one of the better otome games in my opinon, but certainly not one of the best I've seen. In fact, I feel kind of conflicted. I just wanted to get this review out there because I know how confusing this game is to me and I will probably run from saying what needs to be said later on.

"OZMAFIA!", huh? I stumbled into the world of Oz (etc.) a while ago and I have experienced a lot of different things throughout the months of playing this. As I've already mentioned, I am slightly unsure of what to think about this game, which makes reviewing it quite tough for me. Generally speaking, it's a game that includes some adorable romance options (naturally, seeing how this is an otome game), humor and a lot of dark topics. It's not as sweet as you might think so it's surely not for everyone.

I will start by saying that the artwork is absolutely gorgeous and fits the whole story extremely well. The soft colors underline the "fairytale world" we enter as the heroine and the backgrounds and characters are drawn very well. It is pleasant to look at and even after having spent almost 40 hours in this game, I don't get sick of looking at the art.

The voice acting (despite the fact that not every line is voiced) is good as well and I thought that every character had a voice that genuinely fit them. The voice actors did a great job at conveying the different personalities, emotions and moods according to every singular situation.

The characters are lovely for the most part. Caramia is my all-time favorite. I was happy to see someone with a sincerely kind heart who did not mess with you at every chance they get (people who've played this game will understand, which character I'm referring to). Caramia was such a sweetheart and I keep coming back to his route because I enjoy it a lot. Axel was another heartwarming character that was just too adorable to be true. He might be one of the most caring love interests I've seen in an otome game. Kyrie... Had a certain charm to him, I will admit that. However, I ended up liking him the least of the Oz trio. He was a horrible person in so many routes and the fact that he constantly manipulated others was a big "no-go" for me. I understand why he is liked by others but honestly, I'll exclude myself from that. Though I will add that Kyrie had the best fashion sense. His outfit is on point (especially his hat, I love that).
As for the other characters, I liked a lot of them like Scarlet, Pashet (best girl) or Caeser (who is my second favorite love interest in the game). The side characters also are interesting for the most part and improve the game's quality quite a bit.

Moving on, I would like to mention a few aspects that did not bode well with me. There are things included in this game that might trigger a lot of people like sexual abuse, drug abuse (etc.). The brothel route might be the best example for that. It is absolutely disgusting and I really had to force myself to go through it in order to get every ending. I don't mind that "OZMAFIA!" has this dark side to it (like how some routes dove into really difficult/controversial topics like Robin Hood's) but a complete route build on that stuff? [b]Definitely not.[/b] Though my opion is also influenced by the fact that I am not a fan of sexual content at all. Perhaps others have less of a problem with this.

Another issue I had was the whole "love triangle-aspect" that was part of all the Oz love interest routes. I despise love triangles in general but the way you just straight up betray/literally crush your first love interest's heart is utterly painful to do/witness. I felt horrible every time I had to go through with that. I honestly can't imagine how anyone would enjoy this (though I guess some people might think it's nice to see another character getting jealous?). I won't judge but in my opinion, it kind of ruined the main routes for me (not too much though).

The story was intriguing and enjoyable, especially the final conclusion helped a lot. The storytelling seemed a little off at times and there were a few plot holes but most of the problems were explained by the "epilogue". Thumbs up for that.

The MC is... Incredibly stupid. There is a reason for that, yes, but it still was kind of hard to watch from time to time. I don't really know what to think of her, I understand both sides, yet I know that this might annoy a lot of people and I seriously don't blame them. I guess you could say that she's your typical "sweet and utterly naive (to a point where she's straight up stupid) girl". It's up to you what to make out of that...

So would I recommend this game? Definitely. I very much enjoyed the story idea and liked most of the characters. "OZMAFIA!" has a few issues (most of them are minor), yes, but it's still a very well-rounded otome game overall. I definitely got a lot of enjoyment out of it and if you are not too sensitive to certain topics mentioned above (and in other people's reviews) then you will have a good time with this game as well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128786023', 'num_games_owned': 259, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 834, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 620, 'last_played': 1607167922}
review:
Bought Ozmafia!! to play Caeser's route, and I don't regret it.
The MC is cute and quite loveable which is rare in otome games that i've played in the past.  The game is very similar to Amnesia, as the MC has lost her memory and starts off a new life.  I found myself enjoying a few of the routes and a few that I heavily disliked.  Hamelin and Caeser's routes were my favorite as it is the most heartwarming romances in the game.

The only issue I had with the game is the Triangle routes. as I could never bring myself to switch love interests mid route.

author: {'steamid': '76561199045456230', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 695, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 695, 'last_played': 1606373581}
review:
This game makes me go :🔴(

Drama is contrived, there's no flow to the story at all, and the scenes that are meant to be cute or humorous are completely ... dry. The only thing saving this is its beautiful art (good god, those CGs are gorgeous) and its cute soundtrack. To echo another reviewer's sentiment, maybe I'm too old and jaded for otome games now. In either case, it's about as satisfactory as eating a pie and finding that it has no filling.

In conclusion: :🔴(

review: I waited 3 years to get this game because of the price and I must stay that’s the only con to this game! The story follows the MC as she trying to get used to her "new" life with amnesia. the whole branching off of each character’s route is really cool, basically every Sunday in the game you get to pick whoever you want to spend the day with. This makes it super fun, but it does take a long time to 100% the game. And then the art work! I’ve been a Satoi fan for years and her works are just amazing (she’s the same artist for Diabolik Lovers) Honestly I wish I had gotten this game sooner because it's fun!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198144173414', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 6440, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6435, 'last_played': 1607540629}
review:
It's a very enjoyable otome game! I've played quite a few of these games and OZMAFIA is my favourite so far.

It has gorgeous art style, nice music and interesting (a bit weird) story. All main characters here are characters from fairy tales.

Game has a big variety of love interests to choose, some story lines have love triangles [spoiler](Ozes)[/spoiler].

Story lines have 2 endings: good and bad. Game doesn't tell you if your choice contributes to good or bad ending, so naturally good ending is harder to find. Game has gallery for every character so you can look where some endings are missing. "Bad" endings are not often cruel, but they are more sad for sure. However, there is a character where both endings were sad for me...

Every playthrough starts with the same sequence of events, where weekdays you play the same story and weekends you can spend with your man of choice. Weekdays have some choices to play with, but eventually I was bored with replaying the same events. Good thing game has "skip" button for situations like that. 

Weekdays choices impact love triangles story lines, though.
And on weekends you can get to know your love interest better and it depending on your choices it leads to good or bad endings. 

Unlocking one ending for character will also give extra-scenes after every weekend with him, so you'll have some new content on the second playthrough if you feel like it.

Heroine of the story is cute, kind, cheerful, dumb and useless. And also has amnesia. Everything as you may expect from game like this. But she is not annoying and likeable anyways.

author: {'steamid': '76561198253679580', 'num_games_owned': 92, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 492, 'last_played': 1604606933}
review:
Honestly I can't describe how much I love this game. Every day when I come home I just have to play it for a little while it relaxes me... yeah I know it sounds silly haha. 

I love how the characters all have a different personality and that you're able to experience different things with them. The MC (so yeah you) is so dumb and I can't stop laughing about it. It's just so stupid but it's HILARIOUS ! xD 

It was totally worth buying. If you're into dark humor, comedy and romance then this game is 100% something for you. The art style is also very pretty and the Japanese VA's are amazing. Totally love it 10/10 recommending it !! <3

review: Honestly some of the worst writing I've seen in a commercial otome game. The plot is basically non-existent and consists of a string of random, unrelated scenes that all get cut off right before something is actually about to happen, after which we fade to black and get a scene where anything of interest (fight scenes, romantic development) has already taken place.

author: {'steamid': '76561198346382851', 'num_games_owned': 114, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1822, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1822, 'last_played': 1599803951}
review: I really enjoyed this otome! What it lacks in character development for MC it makes up in an interesting story. Certain routes for certain characters don't really make 100% sense until you get to the epilogue and grand finale. It does get more graphic in both violence and sexual content than what I'm used to in otome games but I found it to be intriguing and it wasn't what I'd deem "too much" since there wasn't any nudity. Voice acting was done very nicely and I enjoyed the music and art style. Some of the CG's are downright gorgeous. You aren't going to love all ten characters and certain characters have difficult routes to get through but the ones you don't like you can skip through somewhat quickly (I recommend getting through Robin's route quickly since it's a bit...icky. Thats all I can say without spoilers). Overall it's worth the price and clearly you log the hours if you play to completion. Highly recommend if you like otome games but be warned I don't think this is a good starting otome game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198210994104', 'num_games_owned': 567, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2672, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2672, 'last_played': 1597469254}
review:
Если вы решили приобрести этот "фанфик", то берите только по скидке, полную цену она не стоит. 

Да рисовка красивая, да музыка неплохая, но на этом плюсы данной вн заканчиваются. 
Вы конечно можете сказать, что тут много рутов, да много, но только в паре из них есть хорошая концовка и не все они романтические. И из-за афигительной системы это огромное количество рутов сразу превращается в минус. А что это за система такая? Если вы хотите открыть истинную концовку, вы должны пройти игру на 99%, то есть недостаточно пройти все руты на все концовки, вам надо их перечитывать и перечитывать концовки тоже, чтобы открыть доп. сцены в них, которые не несут сюжетной ценности 95% случаев. А еще у нас тут есть возможность уйти от одного мужика к другому (но только у основных трех мужиков) и это тоже надо перечитывать!!!
Истинная концовка не стоит всего того потраченного времени и сил. Такого бреда я давно не читала. Вообще сюжет здесь плох, гг смазливая, тупая и в некоторых рутах лицемерная тварь (я сейчас бордель имею ввиду) Не говоря о том, что она ничего, абсолютно ничего не умеет и не стремится что-то делать и учиться (она начинает работать полноценно только в 2-3х рутах). Фука (гг) только говорит о том что надо учиться, но ничего не делает. С ней все сюсюкаются и няньчатся, ведь она такая особенная и милая. Честно, уж лучше бы она была простым бревном, чем все это. 
+ повествование просто отвратительное, просто какие-то зарисовки\сценки, которые выглядят как детский сад. Просто детям дали оружие и сказали что они мафиози. (ничего от мафии тут толком нет, тупая романтизация, да еще и плохо сделанная)
Ну и если вы хотите почитать сюжет, то нет, вы не будете читать сюжет, пока не начнется разветвления на концовки, до этого читайте недо-сценки. 

На счет истинной концовки для людей, которые не хотят тратить на это говно время:
[spoiler] Дороти с компашкой пришли к волшебнику Оз и тот рили подарил Льву - смелость, Дровосеку - сердце, а Пугалу - мозги. То есть эта вн срать хотела на одну из главных идей первоисточника, а именно то, что все эти  вещи были у них с самого начала. Но Дороти не смогла отправится домой и стала ведьмой. Да, именно ведьмой! И с какого-то перепугу появилось правило, что Дороти должна жить одна и не использовать магию для себя. Хотя почему-то с ней остался Тотошка. 
По итогу она превратила Пугало, Дровосека и Льва в людей, создала их город, населила его сказочными персами и стала жить в башне посередке без возможности контактировать с миром. Вам уже не тошно от этого? Дальше лучше.
Дороти создает Фуку из своей магии идеальный образ взрослой Дороти и отправляет в мир. Из части магии рождается Цезарь, с желанием вернуть Фуку. Но, главным злодеем оказывается Со, который является ВНИМАНИЕ БАРАБАННАЯ ДРОБЬ фьюзом Тотошки и волшебной башни. Бам. И оказывается, что это он раздал всем оружие, свет с ума перса и строил все козни, чтобы Дороти не хотела попасть в их мир и чтобы Фука вернулась обратно. Эпик фейл. [/spoiler]

И вот ради этого я потратил все время? Мне даже заромансить понравившего персонажа не дали, а с другим хорошей концовки вообще нет. Спасибо, разрабы.

author: {'steamid': '76561198217748544', 'num_games_owned': 202, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 2093, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2093, 'last_played': 1596262762}
review:
Довольно сюрреалистичная картина, захватывающая большой спектр эмоций при прочтении.
В отличие от других новелл, все концовки в той или иной мере - хорошие.

Вкратце без спойлеров:
Руты истинной любви - в какой-то степени ваниль, с довольно чистыми отношениями.
Руты любовных треугольников - это та же ваниль, но с метаниями от одного к другому и наличием интимной жизни.

Цезарь - к этому руту я осталась особенно неравнодушна, волк был воистину прекрасен.
Со - очень милые отношения, детские и чистые. Концовки заставили пожевать стекла и были совершенно непонятны, пока я не прошла эпилог, открывающийся после прохождения всех рутов.
Робин Гуд - интересная история, местами смешная, а где-то и жутковатая. Оставила тепло в душе.
Паше - становимся подружками с девочкой кошкой, в руте нет романтики и отношений, что мне показалось довольно необычным для жанра отомэ.
Скарлетт - так же, рут без отношений и интима, было очень интересно, но обидно, что мы просто завели союзника.
Бордель - это настоящий бдсм и групповухи с откровенными сценами. Собственно, ничего странного.
Гамельн - этот рут прямо настоятельно советуют проходить последним, мол много он спойлерит по сюжету. Но, на мой взгляд, не так уж и много он открыл, т.к. каждая ветка намекает на нечеловеческое происхождение, многих персонажей. Подумать о тех же героях страны Оз (очеловеченные Пугало, Дровосек и Лев), отсылки на известные сказки и прочие пасхалки.

Эпилог - после всех хэппи эндов игры, завезли полный холодильник стекла и заботливо угостили, раскрыв весь бэкграунд происходящего, объяснив кто-есть-кто, расставив все точки и объяснив происхождение амнезийной главной героини.
Гранд Финал - чтобы смягчить полученный шок от эпилога, нам подарили все таки глобальный хеппи энд. Недовольна я только тем, что в нем не видела полюбившегося мне Цезаря.

Минусы:
- Суждения и решения героини порой казались излишне инфантильными. Допустим, что это потом объясняется глобальным сюжетом, но все равно - нельзя же настолько не знать какие-то вещи и не понимать двойных смыслов...
- Глобальный сюжет, честно говоря, мог быть лучше. Я не слишком довольна бэкграундом произошедших событий.

Плюсы:
- Рисовка, не то чтобы гениальная, но местами довольно приятная. Не то, что я привыкла видеть в играх, но свой шарм все же присутствует. Особенно понравилось как нарисован Карамия в финальной сцене наилучшей концовки, очень симпатичен Со (кроме огромных розовых глаз), не могла порой оторвать глаз от Робина и Цезаря.
- Музыка очень отзывалась настроению сцен и очень напоминала музыку из горячо любимой Паровой Тюрьмы. Это был меткий выстрел в мое сердечко.
- Разнообразие рутов и дополнительные сцены при перепрохождении. Да, были руты с некой недосказанностью, где-то хотелось больше романтики, где-то был перебор постельных сцен. Но, видимо такие контрасты, чтобы попасть в наибольшее количество аудитории. В любом случае, каждый рут было интересно читать при всей линейности.
- Длительность прохождения. Я люблю, когда в игру можно погрузиться на долгие часы, прочувствовать и просмаковать ее сцены. Как и с чтением книг, после пройденной игры, сложно взяться за новую, потому что ты сам еще в прошлой. 

Не поставлю игру на одну полку со Steam Prison, над которой я несколько ночей заливисто смеялась и горько рыдала. Но, внимания она конечно же заслуживает. Это довольно легкое чтиво, вызывающее преимущественно теплые чувства и немного слез с Со и Эпилогом. Цезарь ван лав!
